Your body must not sway to the left during the downswing.
Xiàjiàng shí nǐ de shēntǐ juébùnéng xiàng zuǒ yáohuàng。
下降时你的身体决不能向左摇晃。
The girl on the balcony was still swaying, screaming.
Yángtái shàng de nǚhái hái zài yáoyáohuànghuàng de zǒu，bìng bùtíng de jiānjiào。
阳台上的女孩还在摇摇晃晃的走，并不停的尖叫。
She swung her whole body round and fixed her eyes on Henry\'s face.
Tā de zhěnggè shēntǐ zài yáohuàng，yǎnjing què dīngzhe Hālǐ de liǎn。
她的整个身体在摇晃，眼睛却盯着哈里的脸。
You have to shake a drowsy man many times to bring him to his senses.
Nǐ bìxū yáohuàng nà míng hūnhūnyùshuì de nánzǐ shǐ qí sūxǐng。
你必须摇晃那名昏昏欲睡的男子使其苏醒。
The drunk man was staggering about in front of me.
Zhège hēzuì de rén zài wǒ miànqián yáoyáo-huànghuàng de zǒuzhe。
这个喝醉的人在我面前摇摇晃晃地走着。
The room began swimming before his eyes.
Fángjiān kāishǐ zài tā yǎnqián yáohuàng qǐlái。
房间开始在他眼前摇晃起来。
He was staggering about like a wino.
Tā xiàng yí gè jiǔguǐ yáoyáohuànghuàng。
他像一个酒鬼摇摇晃晃。
All the jars and jolts were smoothed out by the shock absorbers.
Suǒyǒu de yáohuàng hé zhèndòng dōu bèi jiǎnzhènqì xiāochú le。
所有的摇晃和震动都被减震器消除了。
The infant had essayed a few wobbly steps.
Zhège yīnger chángshìzhe yáoyáo-huànghuàng zǒule jǐ bù。
这个婴儿尝试着摇摇晃晃走了几步。
The boat limped into the harbor.
Zhè sōu chuán yáoyáo-huànghuàng shǐjìn gǎngkǒu。
这艘船摇摇晃晃驶进港口。
He staggered along in the heavy snow.
Tā zài dàxuě zhōng yáoyáohuànghuàng qiánxíng。
他在大雪中摇摇晃晃前行。
He cradles the child in his arms.
Tā bǎ háizi bào zài bìwān zhōng yáohuàng。
他把孩子抱在臂弯中摇晃。
The ground feels shaky.
Dìmiàn sìhū zài yáohuàng。
地面似乎在摇晃。
The earth shook for several minutes.
Dàdì yáohuàngle jǐ fēnzhōng。
大地摇晃了几分钟。
The bridge still stands though one of the arches is wonky.
Qiáo suīrán réng shùlì zài nà，dàn yǒu yí gè gǒngmén què zài yáohuàngzhe。
桥虽然仍竖立在那，但有一个拱门却在摇晃着。
Don\'t rock the boat or it will capsize!
Búyào yáohuàng xiǎo chuán，fǒuzé tā huì fān de。
不要摇晃小船，否则它会翻的。
The drunk man tottered over to our table.
Zhège zuìguǐ yáoyáo-huànghuàng xiàng wǒmen de cānzhuō zǒulái。
这个醉鬼摇摇晃晃向我们的餐桌走来。
His knees wobbled.
Tā de xīgài yǒuxiē yáohuàng。
他的膝盖有些摇晃。
The truck lurched down the road.
Zhè liàng kǎchē yáoyáo-huànghuàng de kāi guòqù le。
这辆卡车摇摇晃晃地开过去了。
He walked unsteadily toward the exit.
Tā yáoyáohuànghuàng de zǒuxiàng chūkǒu。
他摇摇晃晃地走向出口。
The ladder felt a little wobbly.
Tīzi yǒu yìdiǎn yáohuàng。
梯子有一点摇晃。
He walked with the wiggliness of a child on high heels.
Tā zǒulù shí rú értóng chuānzhe gāogēnxié yíyàng zuǒyáo-yòuhuàng。
他走路时如儿童穿着高跟鞋一样左摇右晃。
Using alternate forward and back motions the child began to swing.
Tōngguò jiāotì xìng qiánhòu huàngdòng zhīhòu，háizi kāishǐ yáobǎi。
通过交替性前后晃动之后，孩子开始摇摆。
别晃动这船。
Bié huàngdòng zhè chuán。
Don\'t rock the boat.
车轮有点晃动。
Chēlún yǒudiǎn huàngdòng。
The wheels wobble a bit.
他总感觉到眼前有黑影在晃动。
Tā zǒng gǎnjuédào yǎnqián yǒu hēiyǐng zài huàngdòng。
He always feels that a shadow sways before him.
照相时不要晃动，免得重影。
旗杆有点儿晃动。
瞥见窗外有个人影晃动。
走在晃动不已的铁索桥上真让人悬心。
I felt the sweep of its ever-moving tail.
我感觉到了它那不停晃动的尾巴。
There was a sudden jolt in the airplane.
Fēijī tūrán yízhèn huàngdòng。
飞机突然一阵晃动。
Using alternate forward and back motions the child began to swing.
Tōngguò jiāotì xìng qiánhòu huàngdòng zhīhòu，háizi kāishǐ yáobǎi。
通过交替性前后晃动之后，孩子开始摇摆。
He kept firm on his feet and swayed his body so that his head was rotating in a large circle.
Tā zhànwěnjiǎogēn，huàngdòng shēntǐ，shǐ tóu xuánzhuǎn chū dà quān。
他站稳脚跟，晃动身体，使头旋转出大圈。
If we place a tiny boat at some fixed point in the pond, the boat will bob up and down rhythmically as the waves pass under it.
Rúguǒ wǒmen bǎ yì tiáo xiǎochuán gùdìng zài chítáng mǒu gè wèizhi，tā jiù huì suízhe chuán dǐxià de làng yǒu jiézòu de shàngxià qīngqīng huàngdòng。
如果我们把一条小船固定在池塘某个位置，它就会随着船底下的浪有节奏地上下轻轻晃动。
She swings and sways with a great song.
Bànzhe yì shǒu hǎo tīng de gēqǔ，tā de shēntǐ huàngdòng qǐlái。
伴着一首好听的歌曲，他的身体晃动起来。
The buildings were badly shaken.
Lóufáng huàngdòng fēicháng lìhai。
楼房晃动非常厉害。
A soft breeze pulsed the air.
Qīngróu de wēifēng huàngdòngzhe kōngqì。
轻柔的微风晃动着空气。
An old woman advanced a few paces to shake her fist virulently in my face.
Yí gè lǎo nǚrén shàngqián jǐ bù，zài wǒ miànqián èdú de huàngdòngzhe tā de quántou。
一个老女人上前几步，在我面前恶毒地晃动着她的拳头。
The passengers were shaken up but are all right.
Chéngkèmen yīn chē huàngdòng de lìhai ér jīngxǐngle，dàn tāmen dōu méi shòushāng。

所有的摇晃和震动都被减震器消除了。
小船在江面上晃荡。

The small boat is rocking on the river.
桶里水很满，一晃荡就出来了。
Tǒnglǐ shuǐ hěn mǎn，yí huǎngdangjiù chūlái le。
The bucket was so full that it overflowed at the slightest motion.
风吹得马灯不停地晃荡。
Fēngchuī de mǎdēngbùtíng de huàngdang。
The barn lantern kept swaying in the wind.
晃荡
水面有风浪，小船直晃荡。
你成天在街上晃荡，也不找点正事干。
We have been loafing about this village for an hour with nothing to do.

我们在村庄里晃荡了一个小时，什么也没做。
他晃晃手说：“不去了”。
Tā huànghuàngshǒu shuō:“bú qù le”。

He was staggering along.

mínghuǎnghuǎng de cìdāo
gleaming bayonets

He walked with faltering steps after a long illness.
明晃晃
mínghuānghuāng
gleaming; shining

Wǒ zhǐ kànjiàn qiánbiān báihuǎnghuǎng de yí piàn。
It is too bright for me to see clearly what is in front of me.
这一片金晃晃的麦田真美啊。

This golden field is so beautiful.
不知道前面是什么亮晃晃的物体在发光。

I don\'t know what is the dazzling object shining in front.
你摇头晃脑的，臭美什么劲儿？

He turned round and saw a shadow flit by.
窗外有个人影儿一晃就不见了。

A figure flashed past the window.

liàng de huǎngyǎn 
be dazzlingly bright
一晃眼十年过去了。

The performance of teeter board was very wonderful, and drew rounds of applause.
他感到很紧张，一直晃摇着身子。

He felt very nervous, and his body was constantly swaying.

他读书的时候摇头晃脑的，好可爱。

他把他的智慧应用在工作上以提高港口的防御能力。
They are too young to have the experience or wisdom to know best.
Tāmen hái tài niánqīng，háiméiyǒu zúgòu de yuèlì hé zhìhuì qù liǎojiě gèngduō。
他们还太年轻，还没有足够的阅历和智慧去了解更多。
The innate wisdom of illiterate peasants is legendary.
Mùbùshídīng de nóngmín de tiānfù zhìhuì hěn fùyǒu chuánqí sècǎi。
目不识丁的农民的天赋智慧很富有传奇色彩。
There are many tales telling of the intelligence and concern shown by creatures of the animal kingdom.

有很多故事讲的是动物界的生物所表现出来的智慧和关心。
His intellectual approach to the management of human resources seems to have made matters worse.
Tā bǎohán zhìhuì de guǎnlǐ rénlì zīyuán de fāngfǎ hǎoxiàng shǐ shìqing biàn de gèng zāo le。
他饱含智慧的管理人力资源的方法好像使事情变得更糟了。
I have many colleagues with exceptional intelligence.
Wǒ de xǔduō tóngshì dōu jùbèi fēifán de zhìhuì。
我的许多同事都具备非凡的智慧。
The general impression conveyed by the earlier centuries is one of wisdom, harmony, and humanity.
Guòqù de jǐ gè shìjì gěi rén de zǒngtǐ yìnxiàng shì zhìhuì、 héxié jí réndào。
过去的几个世纪给人的总体印象是智慧、和谐及人道。
He was distinguished for his wit and politeness.

他以智慧和礼貌而著称。
All my wit and wisdom were wasted on Karen\'s one-track mind.

Superior wisdom derived from experience.

The ordinary reader is endowed with considerable wisdom and knowledge of the way of the world.

the industrious and ingenious people

智慧
zhìhuì
wisdom; intelligence
他独具慧眼，发现了这个有天分的学生。
Tā dújùhuìyǎn，fāxiàn le zhège yǒu tiānfèn de xuésheng。
He is very insightful, he saw the talent in that student.
他有虎胆却没智慧，遇到危险也只管往前冲。
Tā yǒu hǔdǎn què méi zhìhuì，yùdào wēixiǎn yě zhǐguǎn wǎngqián chōng。
He is a man of dauntless courage, but he lacks wisdom. When confronted with danger, he just rushes forward.
历史上的唐伯虎，聪慧绝世，一生坎坷。
Lìshǐshàng de Táng Bóhǔ，cōnghuì juéshì，yìshēng kǎnkě。
Tangbohu from the history was extremely smart, with a troublesome life.
他天资灵慧，一定能够学有所成。
Tā tiānzī línghuì，yídìng nénggòu xuéyǒu suǒchéng。
Smart and astute in nature, he will surely make great achievements in study.
这部书融汇着许多学者的智慧思想。
Zhèbù shū rónghuì zhe xǔduō xuézhě dìzhìhuì sīxiǎng。
The book collects the wisdom and thoughts of many scholars.
智慧的人善于用理性来控制过度的嗜欲。
Zhìhuì de rén shànyú yòng lǐxìng lái kòngzhì guòdù de shìyù。
Intelligent people are good at using reason to control excessive addictions.

Tā měitiān sòngjīng，cóng zhōng lǐngwù dào le dàzhìhuì。
He reads religious scriptures every day, from which he understood a great deal of deep wisdom.

凌乱不堪
línɡluàn bùkān 
in a fearful mess; in a state of utter confusion

tóufa língluàn 
with hair dishevelled

她的屋子乱七八糟的，衣服丢在地板上，书凌乱地放在桌子上。

凌空
língkōng
be high up in the air; soar or tower aloft

凌迟处死
língchí chǔsǐ
execute by the slow process
In the old days，people were drawn and quartered for certain crimes.

in the small hours of July 3

我们说这道那的，不知不觉已到凌晨。

他在那里待到深夜，凌晨两点才回来。

不幸的是，她第二天得凌晨5点钟起床。

现在，每晚电视节目持续到凌晨3点或者4点。

Tiānqì yí biànnuǎn，bīnglíng jiù jiànjiàn rónghuà le。
The ice melts gradually as the weather gets warm.
石花洞的冰凌奇观让人叹为观止。
Shíhuādòng de bīnglíng qíguān ràng rén tànwéiguānzhǐ。
The spectacle of the icicle in the cave is amazing.
冰凌
bīnglíng
icicle
冰凌。
连成一片的冰凌像帘子一样挂在山崖上。
三客冰激凌。
自制冰激凌。
I love peppermint ice cream too.
我也酷爱薄荷冰激凌。
Do you know if at the shop they also sell ices?
你知道那家店也卖冰激凌吗？
I will have that ice-cream now, if the offer still holds.
如果还有货的话，我想要那种冰激凌。
The calorie content in this ice cream is very high.
这种冰激凌的卡路里含量很高。
Did you buy chocolate ice cream? It\'s my favorite!
你买巧克力冰激凌了吗？那是我的最爱！
I would {or} I\'d like an ice-cream/to go for a walk
我想吃个冰激凌/去散步。
The shop had sold out of ice creams.
那家商店的冰激凌卖光了。
As an aspiring thespian he worked at an ice-cream parlour before moving on to a series of minor roles in the theatre.
作为一个有抱负的演员，他在进入剧院出演一些小角色之前，曾经在一个冰激凌店工作。
Before going on your beach holiday, you must diet yourself meat and ice cream, or you won\'t fit into your swimming suit.
在去海滩度假之前，你要少吃肉和冰激凌，不然到时就穿不上泳衣了。
I reward my children for their decent behavior with ice cream.
Háizǐmen jǔzhǐ détǐ，wǒ jiǎnglì tāmen bīngqílíng。
孩子们举止得体，我奖励他们冰淇凌。
In my opinion, ice cream is a delicious dessert.
Zài wǒ kànlái，bīngjīlíng shì hěn kěkǒu de tiándiǎn。
在我看来，冰激凌是很可口的甜点。
I wish that I could have a chocolate icecream right now.
Wǒ qǐngqiú xiànzài néng chī yí kuài qiǎokèlì bīngjīlíng。
我请求现在能吃一块巧克力冰激凌。
A root beer float is great a drink on hot summer days.

I bolted out the door and chased after the ice cream truck.
Wǒ guānzhù mén， zhuīgǎn bīngjīlíngchē。
我关住门，追赶冰激凌车。
After they brought the ice cream, everyone dug in with their spoons.

Wǒmen chī gè dàntǒng bīngjīlíng bā。
我们吃个蛋筒冰激凌吧。

我很偏爱冰激凌。

Tā zhèng chīzhe bīngjīlíng。
他正吃着冰激凌。

Tā chénnìyú bīngjīlíng。
她沉溺于冰激凌。

gēn zài biérén hòumiàn yíbù yíbù de páxíng

那些常春藤攀援而上，爬满了整面墙。

The great staircase in the training ground is too high to climb over.

Higher export goals for the first half year have generally been accomplished.

爬上楼梯

我们要爬上一些台阶才能到达寺庙。

去年我尝试从北坡爬上了日本的富士山。

她父亲搀着她爬上了这座小山。

对我来说，爬上险峻的山十分困难。
It took David three hours to climbed the steep.
大卫花了三小时才爬上悬崖。
I was dead tired after the long hike up the mountain.

Tā gǎnwǎng hǎiwān de yuǎnduān，nàlǐ shì tàiyáng páshàng qiàobì zhàoyàozhe de dìfang。
她赶往海湾的远端，那里是太阳爬上峭壁照耀着的地方。
They climbed upon the tree branches.
Tāmen páshàngle shùzhī。
他们爬上了树枝。
The little boy ascended up the tree without falling.
Nà gè xiǎonánhái pá shàng le nà kē shù ér méiyǒu diē xiàlái。
那个小男孩爬上了那棵树而没有跌下来。
The sun ascended over the clouds.
Tàiyáng pá shàng le yúncéng。
太阳爬上了云层。
Wandering on, they climbed a hill and came to the woods.

在山上摔短腿后，我不得不爬行了两天才抵达安全之所。
I climbed the wall to look over while Sam and Andy were talking.

山姆和安迪正在谈话的时候，我爬上墙看过去。

他这个淘气的孩子，6岁时就会爬梯上墙了。
Tā zhège táoqì de háizi，liùsuì shí jiùhuì pátī shàngqiáng le。
He is such a naughty child, he could climb over ladders and walls when he was just six years old.

Qiángshàngpámǎn le chángchūnténg。

Páshānhǔ bā zài qiáng shàng。
The ivy clings to the wall.
那些常春藤攀援而上，爬满了整面墙。

climb a tree (rope, mountain)

Nà háizi kàn qǐlái hěn kāixīn，dànshì nǐ què hěn jiāozào。
那孩子看起来很开心，但是你却很焦躁。
turbulent grief
焦虑不安的伤心事
调焦镜头
tiáojiāo jìngtóu 
focusing lens
to bring a camera into focus
给照相机调焦距
It loads the film, has a zoom lens with autofocus, autoflash, and winds the film back when finished.
Gěi tā zhuāngshàng jiāojuǎn，shǐyòng dài zìdòng tiáojiāo、zìdòng shǎnguāng de biànjiāo jìngtóu，ránhòu，dāng cāozuò wánbì shí，huízhuǎn jiāojuǎn。
给它装上胶卷，使用带自动调焦、自动闪光的变焦镜头，然后，当操作完毕时，回转胶卷。
Please focus the image; we cannot enjoy the movie.
Qǐng duì huàmiàn tiáojiāo，wǒmen kàn bù qīng diànyǐng le。
请对画面调焦，我们看不清电影了。
Refocus the image until it is very sharp.
Fǎnfù duì huàmiàn tiáojiāo，zhídào jíqí qīngxī wéizhǐ。
反复对画面调焦，直到极其清晰为止。
When congress investigates it brings the full glare of publicity to the agency.
Dāng guóhuì diàochá shí，gōngzhòng guānzhù de jiāodiǎn quánbù jízhōng zài dàilǐjīgòu shàng。
当国会调查时，公众关注的焦点全部集中在代理机构上。
树被烧焦了。
Shù bèi shāojiāo le。
The trees are charred.
火烫烫发是很伤头发的，有时还会把头发烧焦。
Huǒtàng tàngfà shì hěnshāng tóufà de，yǒushí hái huì bǎ tóufà shāojiāo。
Perming one\'s hair is very harmful to the hair and can sometimes burn it.
米饭烧焦了。
Mǐfàn shāojiāole.
The rice is burnt.
饭烧焦了
尸体已被烧得焦烂。
The top right-hand corner of the photo has been damaged by fire.
照片的右上角已经被火烧焦了。
It smells like there is something burning in her kitchen.
她家厨房里有股烧焦的味道。
Be careful, the onion shouldn\'t turn brown.
注意，别把洋葱烧焦。
There was a strong smell of burning in the air.
Kōngqì zhōng yǒu yìzhǒng hěn nóng de shāojiāo de wèidào。
空气中有一种很浓的烧焦的味道。
Fire raged through the building, leaving just a burnt outer shell.
Dàhuǒ sìnuèle zhè dòng dàshà，zhǐ liúxià shāojiāo de wàiké。
大火肆虐了这栋大厦，只留下烧焦的外壳。
She served us underdone bacon and burnt biscuits.
Tā yòng bànshēngbùshú de xūnròu hé shāojiāole de bǐnggān zhāodài wǒmen。
她用半生不熟的熏肉和烧焦了的饼干招待我们。
My eyebrows singed when I bent over the flames.
Wǒ kàojìn huǒyàn shàngfāng wānyāo shí，méimao bèi shāojiāo le。
我靠近火焰上方弯腰时，眉毛被烧焦了。
The fire charred the ceiling above the mantelpiece.
Dàhuǒ shāojiāole bìlú jià shàngmiàn de tiānhuābǎn。
大火烧焦了壁炉架上面的天花板。
At least 50,000 acres have been burnt to a cinder.
Zhìshǎo wǔwàn mǔ tǔdì bèi shāochéng jiāotǔ。
至少五万亩土地被烧成焦土。
The earth was scorched and bare.
Dìmiàn bèi shāo de jiāohénléiléi，guāngtūtū yí piàn。
地面被烧得焦痕累累，光秃秃一片。
三焦辨证
sānjiāo biànzhèng
analysing and differentiating diseases according to the pathological changes in the three visceral cavities

jùjiāo bǎoxiǎn shìchǎng
focus on the insurance market
媒体聚焦。
out of focus
散焦，不聚焦

你的摄像机应该具备以下基本功能：自动聚焦、回放和变焦。
The physicist refocused the light beam.
Zhè wèi wùlǐxuéjiā chóngxīn duì guāngxiàn jùjiāo。
这位物理学家重新对光线聚焦。
Focused light rays can set something afire.
Jùjiāo de guāngxiàn néng bǎ mǒuxiē dōngxi diǎnrán。
聚焦的光线能把某些东西点燃。
几杯酒下肚，不一会儿酒力发作，浑身焦热。
Jī bēi jiǔ xià dù，bùyíhuìr jiǔlì fāzuò，húnshēn jiāorè。
After drinking several cups of wine, he began to feel its effect and became uncomfortably hot all over.
Petroleum coke can be used as either a primary or a secondary fuel.
石油焦炭既可用作初级燃料也可用作二级燃料。

Qínfèn gōngzuò shì tā táobì jiāolǜ de tújìng。
勤奋工作是他逃避焦虑的途径。
Coke is used predominantly as a fuel reluctant in the blast furnace.
焦炭最初是在鼓风炉里作为助燃剂使用。
The heavy paper impregnated with tar is used as part of a roof for waterproofing.
这种用焦油浸泡的重磅纸通常用作屋顶材料，用来防水。
炼制煤焦油。

People smoke for the nicotine from cigarettes but die from the tar.
Rénmen wèile nígǔdīng ér xīyān，què yīn jiāoyóu ér sàngmìng。
人们为了尼古丁而吸烟，却因焦油而丧命。
the poor tarred-and-feathered wretch
kělián de bèi tú shàng jiāoyóu、 zhān shàng yǔmáo de jiāhuo

Petroleum coke is a fuel produced using the byproducts of the petroleum refining process.
石油焦炭是一种燃料，是由石油提炼过程中的副产品加工而成的。
Petroleum coke can be used as either a primary or a secondary fuel.
石油焦炭既可用作初级燃料也可用作二级燃料。
There is no need to rock the boat, this situation is already too messy.
别再火上浇油了，现在已经够焦头烂额的了。

a scorched-earth policy
焦土政策

我们焦虑不安地关注着股票市场的情况。

这个焦虑不安的孩子需要老师的支持和认可。

Wǒ wèi tā de jiànkānggǎndào jiāolǜ。
I am anxious about her health.
恐惧和焦虑正咬啮着她的心。

心情过分焦虑。

anxiety over {or} about sth
对某事感到焦虑
My worst fears were quickly realized.
最令我焦虑的事情很快就发生了。

我过去不这么焦虑

很多学生都有考前焦虑。

Anyone with concerns should initially make an appointment with their dentist.

有些人更容易出现焦虑的症状，或者其它由于压力而引起的疾病。
She felt restless, at odds with herself.
Tā gǎndào jiāolǜ，nǎ dōu búduìjìn。
她感到焦虑，哪都不对劲。

Her anxiety found expression in silence.
Tā de jiāolǜ biǎoxiàn wéi chénmòbùyǔ。

不管怎样，我只是表露出了一丝轻微的焦虑。
The responsibilities of being an angel sometimes weighed on him.
Shēnwéi tiānshǐ，yǒushí zérèn ràng tā gǎndào jiāolǜ。

Rebecca worried at her hands.
Ruìbèikǎ jiāolǜ de bǎinòngzhe zìjǐ de shuāngshǒu。

kěbiànjiāojù jìngtóu

duìjiāojù
adjust the focus
照相要对好焦距
to bring a camera into focus
给照相机调焦距
a zoom telescope
变焦距镜头望远镜
The sums of the distances from the foci to any point on an ellipse is constant.

从焦点到椭圆上任一点的距离之和是一个常数。

liǎnsè jiāohuáng

bǎ mántou kǎo de jiāohuáng

yánchí jiāohuà

主焦点
zhǔjiāodiǎn 
prime (or principal) focus
虚焦点
xūjiāodiǎn 
virtual focus
这就是问题的焦点。
Zhè jiùshì wèntí de jiāodiǎn。
That is the heart of the matter.
争论的焦点
zhēnglùn de jiāodiǎn 
the point at issue
秦始皇的功罪是大家争论的焦点。
Qínshǐhuáng de gōngzuì shì dàjiā zhēnglùn de jiāodiǎn。
The successes and blunders of the First Emperor of Qin is the point at issue.
主焦点
zhǔjiāodiǎn
main focus
选课问题成了同学们议论的焦点。
Xuǎn kè wèntí chéngle tóngxuémen yìlùn de jiāodiǎn.
The problem of choosing courses has become a focus of discussion among the students.
她光彩夺目，成了晚会的焦点。

Liánrì de jiàngshuǐ shǐ zhètiáo héliú shuǐwèi zhíbī jǐngjiè shuǐwèixiàn。
The precipitaion of recent days has raised the water level almost to the warning line.
我军已直逼敌军的警戒线。
Wǒ jūn yǐ zhíbī díjūn de jǐngjièxiàn。
We are heading to our enemy\'s front line.
在办案现场闲杂人等不得越过警戒线。
Zài bànàn xiànchǎng xiánzárénděng bùdé yuèguò jǐngjièxiàn。
People without fixed duties mustn\'t walk past the crime scene\'s police cordon.
本市的气温已超过警戒线。
Běnshì de qìwēn yǐ chāoguò jǐngjièxiàn。
The temperature of our city exceeds the warning point.
她用手上那明闪闪的钻戒向人们宣布：她结婚了。
Tā yòng shǒushàng nà míngshǎnshǎn de zuànjiè xiàng rénmen xuānbù：tā jiéhūn le。
The shining diamond ring on her hand reveals that she got married.
这只金戒指上嵌哅着一颗蓝宝石。
Zhèzhī jīnjièzhǐ shàng qiànxiōng zhe yì kē lánbǎoshí。
A sapphire is embedded in this gold ring.
宝宝手小，手指头也细，不能戴妈妈的戒指。
Bǎobao shǒuxiǎo，shǒuzhǐtou yě xì，bùnéng dài māma de jièzhǐ。
The baby\'s hand is too small and fingers too thin to wear his mom\'s ring.
她戒指上的那颗钻石其实是水钻，不值什么钱。
Tā jièzhǐ shàng de nà kē zuànshí qíshí shì shuǐzuàn，bùzhí shénme qián。
The diamond on her ring is actually man-made, and so almost valueless.
她纤长的无名手指上戴着一枚钻戒。
Tā xiāncháng de wúmíng shǒuzhǐ shàng dài zhe yì méi zuànjiè。
She wears a diamond ring around her slim third finger.
小玉伸出纤纤玉手，接受了定婚戒指。
Xiǎo Yù shēnchū xiānxiān yùshǒu，jiēshòu le dìnghūn jièzhǐ。
Xiao Yu extended her nice thin hand, and accepted the engaging ring.
他的小手指上戴着一枚精致的钻石戒指。
Tā de xiǎoshǒuzhǐ shàng dài zhe yì méi jīngzhì de zuànshí jièzhǐ。
He wears an exquisite diamond ring on his little finger.
我们犯了错误不要紧，重要的是以后要引为鉴戒。
Wǒmen fàn le cuòwù bú yàojǐn，zhòngyào de shì yǐhòu yào yǐnwéi jiànjiè。
It doesn\'t matter that we make mistakes, what matters is that we  take warning from it.
我打算明年戒烟。
Wǒ dǎsuàn míngnián jièyān。
I plan to give up smoking next year.
生物学家在研究动物警戒色的起源问题。
Shēngwùxuéjiā zài yánjiū dòngwù jǐngjièsè de qǐyuán wèntí。
The biologists are studying the origin of the animals\'warning coloration.
他的左手无名指上带着一颗硕大的钻戒。
Tā de zuǒshǒu wúmíngzhǐ shàng dài zhe yì kē shuòdà de zuànjiè。
He wears a large diamond ring around his third left finger.

After giving up drugs, he made a complete break with his past life.
我们不要受某些清规戒律的束缚。
Wǒmen búyào shòu mǒuxiē qīngguī jièlǜ de shùfù.
We don\'t want to be bound by any excessive rules.
军事重地戒备森严。
Jūnshì zhòngdì jièbèisēnyán。
The military area is heavily guarded.
他狠不下去心戒毒。

People in support groups try to help each other stop smoking.
互助组的成员努力支持彼此戒烟。
How many times have I advised you to give up smoking?
我已经劝过你多少次让你戒烟了？
You can\'t stop smoking altogether, you need to give up gradually.
你不能一下子戒烟，你得一点儿一点儿来。
After two hours, she found the ring she was looking for.
她花了两个小时才找到那枚戒指。
I know that if I give up smoking I\'ll become fat.
我知道如果戒烟的话我会变胖。
She has tried all methods to give up smoking.
各种戒烟的办法她都试过了。

他送了她一只很便宜的戒指。
The platinum has been treated with the gold to make the ring so beautiful.
铂金经过处理，和黄金混合制成的戒指真的好美。

我想知道要是戒酒能省下多少钱呢？

这个戒指对我来说意义重大，那是我祖母传下来的。

自从上次宿醉之后她就戒酒了。
He is wearing a ring.
他戴着戒指。

穆斯林教徒会在斋月期间斋戒。

牧师在三个星期的斋戒期间只进食水和面包。

他是个瘾君子，必须去戒毒所。

因为健康原因，她不得不戒了烟。

她的订婚戒指上有一枚硕大的钻石。

她把钻戒丢了。

你是要戒烟吗？

我已经戒烟了。

911恐怖袭击发生后，美国军方进入最高戒备。

这人做了错事还理直气壮地说昏话，脸皮也太厚了！

A cup of coffee will refresh you if you feel dazed.

Xiànzài de huángdì shì gè hūnjūn，měitiān zhǐ zhīdào zài wéichǎng dǎliè。

尽管身体不舒服，他还是坚持工作。
If the shoes are faulty they\'re going to quickly feel very uncomfortable.
Rúguǒ xié mǎ búduì，tāmen hěnkuài jiù huì gǎndào bù shūfu。
如果鞋码不对，他们很快就会感到不舒服。
She was annoyed to hear the slight tremble in her voice.
Tīngdào zìyǐ shēngyīn yǒuxiē chàndǒu，tā xīnlǐ hěn bù shūfu。
听到自已声音有些颤抖，她心里很不舒服。
Brian has been troubled by bad health for quite awhile now.
Bùláiēn yīn shēntǐqiànjiā ér bù shūfu hǎo yízhènzǐ le。
布莱恩因身体欠佳而不舒服好一阵子了。
I woke up late afternoon sometime with a funny taste in my mouth.
Wǒ yǒushí huì zài kuài dào bàngwǎn de shíhou xǐnglái，zuǐ lǐ yǒu yì gǔ bù shūfu de wèidào。
我有时会在快到傍晚的时候醒来，嘴里有一股不舒服的味道。
Sitting cross-legged on the floor for a lecture was a painful business.
Pán jiǎo zuòzài dìbǎn shàng tīngkè shì jiàn hěn bù shūfu de shìqing。
盘脚坐在地板上听课是件很不舒服的事情。
He was feeling tough after a restless night.
Tōngxiāo wèi shuì，tā gǎnjué hěn bù shūfu。
通宵未睡，他感觉很不舒服。
She did look unwell -- her face was pale.
Tā kànqǐlái bù shūfu——tā de liǎnsè cāngbái。
她看起来不舒服——她的脸色苍白。
I did not feel myself in a strange land.
Zài mòshēng de dìfang，wǒ gǎnjué bù shūfu。
在陌生的地方，我感觉不舒服。
I got my fingers burned，and still feel uncomfortable going back to those times.
Wǒ chījìn le kǔtóu，huíxiǎng qǐ nà duàn rìzi，wǒ yī gǎnjué bù shūfu。
我吃尽了苦头，回想起那段日子，我依感觉不舒服。
She felt sick, so gave the mountain walk a miss.
Tā gǎnjué bù shūfu，suǒyǐ háishì bié qù páshān le。
她感觉不舒服，所以还是别去爬山了。
The conservatives had a thin time of it in the 19th century.
Bǎoshǒupài zài shíjiǔ shìjì rìzi guò de bìng bù shūfu。
保守派在19世纪日子过得并不舒服。
John woke in the middle of the night feeling sick.
Yuēhàn bànyè xǐnglái， gǎnjué bù shūfu。
约翰半夜醒来，感觉不舒服。
May has got a cold and is not quite up to the mark.
Méi gǎnmàole， shēntǐ yǒudiǎn bù shūfu。
梅感冒了，身体有点不舒服。
A rasping sound echoed through the room set his teeth on edge.
Yí zhèn cì\'ěr de shēngyīn huá guò fángjiān ràng tā gǎndào hěn bù shūfu。
一阵刺耳的声音划过房间让他感到很不舒服。

Nàge kělián de shēngyīn ràng tā xīnlǐ hěn bù shūfu。
那个可怜的声音让她心里很不舒服。

如果我不去习惯我的鞋，它会很不舒服。

She felt bad all over.

她感觉哪里都不舒服。

我感到很不舒服，就去看了医生。
The teacher\'s presence at the conference made the child very uncomfortable.

This kind of life can prove disruptive and uncomfortable.

这种生活被证明是破坏性的，让人感到不舒服。
She lay on the couch, her body uncomfortably twisted.
Tā tǎngzài shāfā shàng，shēnzi fēicháng bù shūfu de quánzhe。
她躺在沙发上，身子非常不舒服地蜷着。
The pornographic pictures sickened us.

She wasn\'t very well yesterday.
她昨天不太舒服。
You look kind of sick, love.
哎，你看起来不太舒服啊。
You can crash here, though it\'s not very comfortable.
Suīrán Zhèer búshì hěn shūfu，dàn nǐ háishì kěyǐ còuhézhe shuì yì wǎnshàng。
虽然这儿不是很舒服，但你还是可以凑和着睡一晚上。
She is comfortable, yet lonely.
她很舒服，不过很孤独。
A padded chair was one of the room\'s few comforts.
Zuòdiànyǐ shì zhège fángjiān lǐ wéishùbùduō de yí jiàn shūfu jiājù。
坐垫椅是这个房间里为数不多的一件舒服家具。
They were perfectly comfortable together without speech.
Tāmen zài yìqǐ bù shuōhuà de shíhou fēicháng shūfu。
他们在一起不说话的时候非常舒服。

新床不像我买时想的那么舒服。
He was wearing a dark suit instead of his usual comfortable clothes.
Tā chuānzhe yí jiàn shēnsè wàitào，ér bú shì tōngcháng nà jiàn shūshì de yīfu。
他穿着一件深色外套，而不是通常那件舒适的衣服。
He kept pounding his pillow, trying to get comfortable.
Tā búduàn pāidǎ zhěntou，xiǎng shuì de shūfu diǎn。
他不断拍打枕头，想睡得舒服点。
My bed is so comfortable. I never want to get up in the morning.
我的床舒服极了，早上我都不想起了。

Tā kāi zhe yí liàng tuōdòu zǒu le，bùzhī yào qù lā shénme dōngxi。
He drove away a trailer, but I don\'t know what he is going to carry.
拖拉机走在路上铿铿地响。

Tractors clattered along the road.
他拖着断肢，艰难行走。
Tā tuō zhe duànzhī，jiānnán xíngzǒu。
With one of his legs cut off, he walks with difficulty.
他拖着疲弱的双腿缓慢地往前走。
Tā tuō zhe píruò de shuāngtuǐ huǎnmàn de wǎngqián zǒu。
He dragged his tired legs slowly along.
把被台风刮倒的大树拖走。
He dragged away the dead deer.
Tā tuōzǒule sǐlù。
他拖走了死鹿。
Long queues had formed before the car was towed away by police.

在警察拖走这辆汽车之前，已经排成了长队。
The trucks were hauling away the debris from the accident site.
Kǎchē tuōzǒu shìgù xiànchǎng de cánhái。
卡车拖走事故现场的残骸。
The relic was hauled up from the quarry.
Yíjì cóng shíchǎng bèi tuōzǒu。
遗迹从石场被拖走。
Four cars have been towed away for forensic tests.

我的箱子都是有轮子的，拖着走很方便。

拖着脚步走上/下楼梯

拖延时间
tuōyán shíjiān 
play for time; stall (for time)
由于这件事情的影响，对你的提职要拖延一段时间了。
Yóuyú zhèjiàn shìqing de yǐngxiǎng，duì nǐ de tízhí yào tuōyán yíduàn shíjiān le。
Because of this matter, your promotion has to be delayed until a later date.
The host has to give a long talk to spin the time out.
主持人必须讲很长一段话来拖延时间。
Perhaps the rebels were stalling for time, awaiting the arrival of his reinforcements.
Huòxǔ pànjūn zài tuōyán shíjiān，děngdài yuánjūn de dàolái。
或许叛军在拖延时间，等待援军的到来。
I was stalling for time to guess the correct answer.
Wǒ kāishǐ tuōyán shíjiān lái cāicè zhèngquè dá\'àn。
我开始拖延时间来猜测正确答案。
He may have bought time for himself, but he stored up trouble for his successors.
Tā kěnéng yǐ tuōyánle shíjiān，dàn gěi jìrènzhě dàiláile máfan。
他可能已拖延了时间，但给继任者带来了麻烦。
He managed to hold them off and won the race.
Tā shèfǎ chénggōng tuōyánle tāmen de shíjiān，qǔdéle bǐsài de shènglì。
他设法成功拖延了他们的时间，取得了比赛的胜利。
to play for time
为争取时间而拖延
They \'d already caused long delays by working to rule.
Zhàozhāng gōngzuò，tāmen yǐ zàochéng hěn cháng shíjiān de tuōyán。
他们通过怠工已造成很长时间的拖延。
I will try to stall off the reporters as long as possible.
Wǒ huì shèfǎ jìnkěnéng cháng shíjiān de tuōyán nàxiē jìzhě。
我会设法尽可能长时间地拖延那些记者。
期限快到，不能再拖延了。
Qīxiàn kuài dào，bùnéng zài tuōyán le。
The deadline is drawing near; we can\'t delay any more.

tuōyán shíjiān 
play for time; stall (for time)

他负责拖延和抵抗敌人的进攻。

把某事往后拖延
to play for time
为争取时间而拖延
They could delay the flight still further.
他们能将航班拖延得更久。

主持人必须讲很长一段话来拖延时间。

Wǒmen bèi fánmáng de jiāotōng tuōyán le。

All of these cases succeed in dragging out the film well past its natural limit.

所有的这些成功拖延影片的情况已超出自然极限。
I was holding off from speaking my mind.
Wǒ bèi tuōyánle huì\'er cái jiǎngchū zìjǐ de xiǎngfǎ。
我被拖延了会儿才讲出自己的想法。
They hope it holds off at least for the next few weeks.
Tāmen xīwàng tā zhìshǎo néng bèi tuōyán jǐ zhōu。
他们希望它至少能被拖延几周。

快点，不要拖延管理杂务。
I\'ve been putting off this project for weeks now.

我已经拖延这个项目几个星期了。

我会设法尽可能长时间地拖延那些记者。
She doesn\'t want to write the report，so she is stalling.
Tā bù xiǎng xiě zhè fèn bàogào，yīncǐ，tā yìzhí zài tuōyán。
她不想写这份报告，因此，她一直在拖延。
When she doesn\'t like to face a problem, she simply stonewalls.
Dāng tā bùxiǎng miànduì mǒu gè wèntí de shíhou，tā jiù tuōyán。
当她不想面对某个问题的时候，她就拖延。
He did not want to write the letter and procrastinated for days.
Tā bù xiǎng xiěxìn，yīncǐ tuōyánle hǎo jǐ tiān。
他不想写信，因此拖延了好几天。
It was a strange dragging approach.
Tā shì yí xiàng qíguài de tuōyán zhànlüè。
它是一项奇怪的拖延战略。

Yǎnjiǎngzhě búduàn tuōyán，yǐbiàn yánchí tóupiào。
演讲者不断拖延，以便延迟投票。
一只拖鞋
Yìzhī tuōxié
a slipper
拖鞋。
diamanté sandals
嵌镶闪光石的拖鞋
Put on your slippers.
穿上你的拖鞋。
She might be go out for a hike later in her slippers.
Tā kěnéng guò huìr huì chuānzhe tuōxié chūqù sànbù。
她可能过会儿会穿着拖鞋出去散步。
Sitting on the side of the bed, he put on his slippers.
Tā zhèng zuòzài chuáng de yìbiān chuān tuōxié。
他正坐在床的一边穿拖鞋。
She put the slippers under the bed neatly.
Tā bǎ tuōxié zhěngqí de bǎizài chuáng xià。
她把拖鞋整齐地摆在床下。
拖人下水
tuō rén xiàshuǐ
involve sb. in evildoing; drag sb. into the mire
拖网渔船
tuōwǎnɡ yúchuán 
trawler
Last night the U-boat was towed by a trawler to Iceland.
昨晚那艘U潜艇被一艘拖网渔船拖到了冰岛。
A study estimated that there almost 12,000 albatrosses died in the South African trawl fishery this year.
研究估计今年有近1.2万只信天翁死于南非的拖网捕鱼作业。
His brother and I were shipmates on a trawler once.
我与他的哥哥曾在同一艘拖网渔船上工作。
不要再拖拖拉拉了，亡羊补牢为时未晚！
Búyào zài tuōtuōlālā le，wángyángbǔláo wéishí wèiwǎn！
Stop putting things off. It\'s never too late to take precautions after suffering a loss.
就因为你总是拖拖拉拉的，我们才会误车。
Jiù yīnwèi nǐ zǒngshì tuōtuōlālā de，wǒmen cái huì wùchē。
We missed the train because you dragged your feet.
他做事一向拖拖拉拉。
Tā zuòshì yíxiàng tuōtuō-lālā。
Whatever he does he always drags his feet.
她办事快当麻利，从不拖拖拉拉。
他总是拖拖拉拉的，没有一叫就到的时候。
This novel rambles on and jogs.
Zhè bù xiǎoshuō tuōtuō-lālā。
这部小说拖拖拉拉。
The speech dragged on for two hours.
Zhège yǎnjiǎng tuōtuōlālā jìnxíngle liǎng gè xiǎoshí。
这个演讲拖拖拉拉进行了两个小时。
下课铃打了，老师还在滔滔不绝地拖堂。
Xiàkèlíngdǎ le，lǎoshī hái zài tāotāobùjué de tuōtáng。
The teacher was still holding forth after the bell had rung.
王老师上课从不拖堂。
He bayed out sentences as a joke in class.
Tā zài kètáng shàng kāiwánxiào，gùyì shuōhuà tuō yīn。
他在课堂上开玩笑，故意说话拖音。
拖人下水
tuō rén xiàshuǐ
involve sb. in evildoing; drag sb. into the mire
办事要利落，不要拖泥带水。
Bànshì yào lìluo，búyào tuōnídàishuǐ。
Do things deftly, not sloppily.
他工作总拖泥带水。
Tā gōngzuò zǒng tuōnídàishuǐ。
He\'s always slapdash in his work.
说话要直接，别拖泥带水。
Shuōhuà yào zhíjiē，bié tuōnídàishuǐ。
Say what you\'ve got to say, don\'t beat about the bush.
她一向非常决断，办事从不拖泥带水。
他办事爽快，从不拖泥带水。
他拖着疲弱的双腿缓慢地往前走。
Tā tuō zhe píruò de shuāngtuǐ huǎnmàn de wǎngqián zǒu。
He dragged his tired legs slowly along.
The excessive resort to public ownership is a drag on economic development.
Guòduō de yīlài gōngyǒuzhì huì tuōmàn jīngjì fāzhǎn bùfá。
过多地依赖公有制会拖慢经济发展步伐。
The draft moved slowly behind these people.
人们拖拽着货物慢慢前行。
这个港口十分繁忙，所有的拖轮都在工作。
Zhège gǎngkǒu shífēn fánmáng，suǒyǒu de tuōlún dōu zài gōngzuò。
This harbor is very busy, all the tugboats are working.
历史的巨轮是拖不回来的。
Lìshǐ de jùlún shì tuō bu huílái de。
The wheel of history cannot be turned back.
货轮只拖运货物，不载客。
The tugboat tugged the freighter into the harbor.
拖轮把货船拖进海港了。
Tugboat operation is the important part of the service system of the port.
港口拖轮作业是港口服务系统的重要组成部分。
My suitcase is on wheels, so it is easy to pull.
我的箱子都是有轮子的，拖着走很方便。
A large ship was being tugged into the harbor.
Yìsōu jùlún zhèng bèi tuō jìn hǎigǎng。
一艘巨轮正被拖进海港。
An enormous tractor with giant wheels was driving across his path.
Yí liàng lúnzi jùdà de dà tuōlājī cóng tā miànqián chuānguò。
一辆轮子巨大的大拖拉机从他面前穿过。
The car had a flat and needed to be towed to the nearest garage.
Qìchē lúntāi lòuqìle，bìxū tuōdào zuìjìn de xiūlǐchǎng。
汽车轮胎漏气了，必须拖到最近的修理厂。
A tug boat can pull much larger ships.
Yì sōu tuōchuán kěyǐ lā bǐ tā dà de duō de lúnchuán。
一艘拖船可以拉比它大得多的轮船。
受家务拖累
shòu jiāwù tuōlěi 
be tied down by household chores
子女过多是个拖累。
Zǐnǚ guòduō shì gè tuōlěi。
Too many children are a burden.
家务拖累。
是我拖累了他。
拖家带口，累赘死了。

这个部门已经被金融债务拖累了。
I tried to run but I was held back by my clumsy boots.

我试着跑起来，但是却被笨重的靴子拖累了。

新的股票市场没有被传统所拖累。
铁牛是拖拉机的别名。
Tiěniú shì tuōlājī de biémíng。
Iron-ox is another name for tractor.

Tuōlājī zài nílù shàng yàchū liǎng dào gōu。
The tractor made ruts in the dirt road.

jiàshǐ tuōlājī 
drive a tractor

caterpillar (or crawler) tractor

Capitalists occupy the surplus value created by the productive forces for free.

马克思创立了剩余价值学说

I intend to store these surplus Chinese cabbages for winter.

Apart from 3000 yuan basic salary, the remaining income is floating wages.
资本家无偿占有了生产者创造的剩余价值。
Zīběnjiā wúcháng zhànyǒu le shēngchǎnzhě chuàngzào de shèngyú jiàzhí。
Capitalists occupy the surplus value created by the productive forces for free.
作为普通劳动者，我们自己很难区分必要劳动和剩余劳动。

资本家利用劳工的剩余价值发家致富。
Zīběnjiā lìyòng láogōng de shèngyú jiàzhí fājiā zhìfù。
Capitalists use laborers\' surplus value to make a fortune.

剩余
马克思创立了剩余价值学说

剩余产品。
还有少量剩余。
a residuary legatee
剩余遗产的继承人
the residuary clause in a will
遗嘱中关于处理剩余财产的条款

因为没有剩余的空房间，就只能在沿街的旅店里接待后来的人了。
They used to have milk lakes due to overproduction.
由于产量过剩，他们过去经常出现牛奶大量剩余的状况。
to have time/money to spare
有剩余的时间/金钱
Profit is the excess of sales over costs.
利润是销售额减去成本后的剩余部分。
A team member may leave a team and race as an unaffiliated rider for the remainder of the season.
车队成员可以选择脱离其车队，单独完成赛季剩余的比赛
Their schedule continues to be undemanding the rest of this week.
这周剩余的日程继续比较轻松。

我们有剩余的度假津贴。

探险队的剩余人员都希望能交好运。

资本补贴会导致产能过剩和资本回报率低下。

这一晚的剩余时间，攻击渐渐减缓下来。

Wǒ zhǐ shèng wǔ kuài qián le。

我兜里就剩一点儿钱了。

这笔钱平均分配到每个人的头上就所剩无几了。

我希望我已经花了剩下的钱，买了一台好点的机器。
How much money have you got left?

你还剩多少钱了？

shènghuò

He dismissed his savants, and stayed alone with his friend in the hall.
我国的很多古本文献都只剩下一些断编残简。

你去查一下存本，看看我们的货物还剩多少。

我打算把这些剩余的大白菜冬藏起来。

I intend to store these surplus Chinese cabbages for winter.

After the fire, there is nothing left except broken walls.
孩子发身早，是不是由于营养过剩造成的？

Can children\'s early puberty be attributed to over-nutrition?
除3000的底薪外，剩余的收入都是浮动工资。

All the others in my dorm have given up on preparing for the postgraduate entrance exams, leaving me to fight the battle alone.
他顾不及擦去头上的汗水，就又去营救剩下的伤员。
Tā gùbùjí cāqù tóushàng de hànshuǐ，jiù yòu qù yíngjiù shèngxià de shāngyuán。
He didn\'t even stop to wipe off the sweat on his forehead before he went to rescue the rest of the injured.

The laying of pipelines has been completed, except for a few joints.
他现在没有实权了，只剩下一个好听的空衔。

Now he only has a pleasant empty title, but no real power.
电影院的座位已爆满，而票还剩许多，看来又有人漏票了。
Diànyǐngyuàn de zuòwèi yǐ bàomǎn，ér piào hái shèng xǔduō，kànlái yòu yǒurén lòupiào le。
Every seat in the theater is taken, but many tickets remain unsold. Lots of people must have snuck through without paying.
他把煤饼搬走了，地下只剩下一层煤末。
Tā bǎ méibǐng bānzǒu le，dìxià zhǐ shèngxià yì céng méimò。
He moved the coal cakes away, and there was only coal dust left on the floor.
点心被我吃完了，盘子里只剩下点心末子了。
Diǎnxīn bèi wǒ chīwán le，pánzi lǐ zhǐ shèngxià diǎnxīn mòzi le。
I ate all the snacks, and there was only some powder left on the plate.
资本家无偿占有了生产者创造的剩余价值。
Zīběnjiā wúcháng zhànyǒu le shēngchǎnzhě chuàngzào de shèngyú jiàzhí。
Capitalists occupy the surplus value created by the productive forces for free.
作为普通劳动者，我们自己很难区分必要劳动和剩余劳动。
Zuòwéi pǔtōng láodòngzhě，wǒmen zìjǐ hěnnán qūfēn bìyào láodòng hé shèngyú láodòng。
As ordinary laborers, we can hardly tell necessary labor from surplus labor.
他好赌成性，家中已经让他输得所剩无几了。
Tā hàodǔ chéngxìng，jiā zhōng yǐjing ràng tā shū de suǒshèng wújǐ le。
He is addicted to gambling, and has lost almost everything in his home.
这笔钱平均分配到每个人的头上就所剩无几了。
Zhèbǐ qián píngjūn fēnpèi dào měigèrén de tóushàng jiù suǒshèng wújǐ le。
When the money is divided equally, each person can only receive very little.
小王吃完饭后身上就只下剩三十块钱了。
Xiǎo Wáng chīwánfàn hòu shēnshàng jiù zhǐ shèngxià sānshí kuài qián le。
After his meal, Xiao Wang had only 30 yuan left.
长期营养过剩已成为影响现代人健康的隐性杀手。
Chángqī yíngyǎng guòshèng yǐ chéngwéi yǐngxiǎng xiàndàirén jiànkāng de yǐnxìng shāshǒu。
Long-term excessive nutrition has become an invisible killer for modern society.
妈妈舍不得浪费，总是自己吃掉儿子余剩的饭。
Māma shěbùdé làngfèi，zǒngshì zìjǐ chīdiào érzi yúshèng de fàn。
Mother doesn\'t like to waste money and always eats her son\'s leftovers.
年年采伐导致这里只剩下濯濯荒山了。
Niánnián cǎifá dǎozhì zhèlǐ zhǐ shèngxià zhuózhuó huāngshān le。
Continuous lumbering has changed this place into bare mountains.
政治课上，老师给我们讲了必要产品和剩余产品的区别。
Zhèngzhìkè shàng，lǎoshī gěi wǒmen jiǎng le bìyào chǎnpǐn hé shèngyú chǎnpǐn de qūbié。
In the political education class, the teacher tells us the difference between necessary products and surplus products.
商品生产过剩会导致经济危机。
Shāngpǐn shēngchǎn guòshèng wǎngwǎng huì dǎozhì jīngjì wēijī。
Over-producing a commodity can lead to an economic crisis.
资本家利用劳工的剩余价值发家致富。
Zīběnjiā lìyòng láogōng de shèngyú jiàzhí fājiā zhìfù。
Capitalists use laborers\' surplus value to make a fortune.

The Drunk-driver bites others while getting bitten himsel.  We should make a scathing indictment of the unlawful action.

In autumn, the chirping of crickets can always be heard in a garden.
当他们开始新的远航时，我们鸣炮欢送了他们。
Dāng tāmen kāishǐ xīn de yuǎnháng shí，wǒmen míngpào huānsòng le tāmen。
Before they took a long voyage, we fired firecrackers to see them off.

After the referee fired his gun, the long-distance running athletes began running.

Zìyóu de niǎor zài shùzhī shàng míngzhuàn，gěi shānlín dàilái le bóbó shēngjī。
Free birds are twittering on the branches, and make the wood exuberant and vigorous.
秋天的草丛里，蛐蛐们又开始鸣奏它们的音乐了。

In autumn, crickets begin to sing in the grass.
泄洪时泡漩翻滚、水浪轰鸣，场面很壮观。

The flood discharge scene is magnificent, with whirlpools rotating and waves roaring.
入秋以后的蝉鸣显得特别清切。

这只公鸡每天早上六点打鸣。

A good way to identify birds is by their call notes.
通过鸟的鸣叫声就能判定鸟的种类。

jiǎgǔwén

陷入饥寒交迫的困难境地
xiànrù jīhánjiāopò de kùnnan jìngdì 
suffer the terrible hardship of hunger and cold
陷入完全孤立的境地
xiànrù wánquán gūlì de jìngdì
land oneself in utter isolation
陷入牢笼
xiànrù láolóng
fall into a trap; be entrapped
汉朝的灭亡使中国陷入了分裂的局面。
Hàncháo de mièwángshǐ Zhōngguó xiànrù le fēnliè de júmiàn。
The downfall of the Han Dynasty brought China national disunity.
陷入泥坑
xiànrù níkēng
get stuck in the mud; be bogged down in a quagmire
陷入泥泞
xiànrù nínìng
get stuck in the mire
陷入穷困的境地
xiànrù qióngkùn de jìngdì
be reduced to destitution
陷入被动地位
xiànrù bèidòngdìwèi
fall into a passive position
陷入沉思
xiànrù chénsī
be lost in thought; be deep in meditation
谈判陷入僵局。
Tánpàn xiànrù jiāngjú。
The negotiations came to a deadlock. or The negotiations reached an impasse.
陷入困境的她孤立无援，只能靠自己了。
Xiànrù kùnjìng de tā gūlì wúyuán，zhǐnéng kào zìjǐ le。
Being caught in a dilemma, she is cut off from help and has to rely on herself.
这道难题使他双眉紧锁，陷入深深的思考。
Zhè dào nántí shǐ tā shuāngméi jǐnsuǒ，xiànrù shēnshēn de sīkǎo。
He frowned at the difficult question and got lost in thought.
他和老婆陷入了儿子抚养权的争夺战中。
Tā hé lǎopó xiànrù le érzi fǔyǎngquán de zhēngduózhàn zhōng。
He and his wife are fighting for the right to support their son.
他陷入了沉思。
Tā xiànrùle chénsī。
He was lost in thought.
他的情绪陷入了低谷。
Tāde qíngxù xiànrùle dīgǔ。
He\'s in the doldrums.
谈判陷入僵局。
Tánpàn xiànrùjiāngjú.
The talks reached a deadlock.
一旦发生核战争，整个地球将会陷入灾难。
Yídàn fāshēng hézhànzhēng，zhěnggè dìqiú jiānghuì xiànrù zāinàn。
If atomic war were to break out, it would be disastrous for the whole world.
堕入陷阱
duò rù xiànjǐng
fall into a trap
你不要被事情的假相所蒙敝，掉入坏人的陷阱里。
Nǐ búyào bèi shìqing de jiǎ xiàng suǒ méngbì，diàorù huàirén de xiànjǐng lǐ。
Keep yourself from being misled by the disguises of bad people, so you won\'t fall into their traps.
陷入迷误。
陷入层层包围之中

他陷入走又走不了，不走又干不下去的窘境。

陷入困境。

It\'s too easy to fall into the trap of being negative.

很容易陷入太过消极的陷阱。

母亲的过世使他陷入恍惚之中。
Her departure left him in utter devastation.
Tā de líqù shǐ tā xiànrù chèdǐ de juéwàng zhōng。
她的离去使他陷入彻底的绝望中。
The legislation ran into a logjam.
Lìfǎ xiànrùle jiāngjú。
立法陷入了僵局。
Our people should not be mired in the past.
Wǒmen de rénmín bù yīngdāng xiànrù guòqù bùnéng zìbá。
我们的人民不应当陷入过去不能自拔。
He resigned and left me in the lurch.
Tā cízhíle，wǒ què xiànrù kùnjìng。
他辞职了，我却陷入困境。
I was caught in the bastardly traffic.
Wǒ xiàn rù háowúyìyì de jiāotōng dǔsè zhīzhōng。
我陷入毫无意义的交通堵塞之中。
The middle east is fermenting.
Zhōngdōng xiànrù dòngluàn。
中东陷入动乱。
The sudden storm immobilized the traffic.
Bùqī\'érzhì de bàofēngyǔ shǐ jiāotōng xiànrù tānhuàn。
不期而至的暴风雨使交通陷入瘫痪。
There I was back on the hook.
Wǒ zài nàlǐ xiànrùle quāntào。
我在那里陷入了圈套。
His vigorous backing of the Conservatives got him in trouble with Progressives.
Tā duì bǎoshǒupài de yǒulì zhīchí shǐ tā xiànrù yǔ jījìnpài de jiūfēn zhōng。
他对保守派的有力支持使他陷入与激进派的纠纷中。
Islam is fermenting Africa.
Yīsīlánjiào shǐ Fēizhōu xiànrù dòngluàn。
伊斯兰教使非洲陷入动乱。
The mud mired our cart.
Wǒmen de mǎchē xiànrù níjiāng。
我们的马车陷入泥浆。
She was madly in love.
Tā fēngkuáng de xiànrùle àihé。
她疯狂地陷入了爱河。
An indecisive manager brought the enterprise to a standstill.
Yì míng yōuróuguǎduàn de jīnglǐ huì shǐ zhěnggè qǐyè xiànrùtíngdùn。
一名优柔寡断的经理会使整个企业陷入停顿。
The vote would bog down the house.
Biǎojué jiāng shǐ Zhòngyìyuàn xiànrù kùnjìng。
表决将使众议院陷入困境。
He made a muddle of his marriage.
Tā de hūnyīn xiànrù yìtuánzāo。
他的婚姻陷入一团糟。
Rome had fallen into moral putrefaction.
Luómǎ shèhuì céng xiànrù guò dàodé fǔbài de zhuàngkuàng。
罗马社会曾陷入过道德腐败的状况。
Our worries are lilliputian compared with those of countries that are at war.
Yǔ nàxiē xiànrù zhànzhēng de guójiā de dānyōu xiāng bǐjiào，wǒmen de dānyōu shízai bùzhíyìtí。
与那些陷入战争的国家的担忧相比较，我们的担忧实在不值一提。
Brilliant leadership mired in details and confusion.
Jīngmíng de lǐngdǎo xiànrù dào xìjié hé hùnluàn zhīzhōng。
精明的领导陷入到细节和混乱之中。
Germany is not alone in its corporate spying scandals.
xiànrù Gōngsī jiàndié chǒuwén de búzhǐshì Déguó。
陷入公司间谍丑闻的不只是德国。
Captive ducks or a dog were used to lure the birds into the trap.
Shǐyòng pūhuò de yāzi huò yì zhī gǒu lái yǐnyòu niǎo jìnrù xiànjǐng。
使用扑获的鸭子或一只狗来引诱鸟进入陷阱。
I feel trapped，caged in，and locked inside these walls.
Wǒ juéde zìjǐ diàorù xiànjǐng，shēnkùn láolóng，bèi suǒzài chóngchóng gāoqiáng zhōng。
我觉得自己掉入陷阱，身困牢笼，被锁在重重高墙中。
许多盆地都是因地壳陷落而形成的。
Xǔduō péndì dōushì yīn dìqiào xiànluò ér xíngchéng de。
Many basins were formed by the subsidence of the earth\'s crust.

xiànluò chóngwéi
find oneself tightly encircled
陷落困境
xiànluò kùnjìng
land oneself in a predicament; be put in a tight spot; be cornered
南京于1937年12月陷落。
Nánjīngyú yījiǔsānqī nián shí\'èr yuè xiànluò。
Nanjing fell into enemy hands in December 1937.
前面是块滩地，不要轻易的落脚，以免陷下去。

shèjì xiànhài

zhènɡzhì xiànhài

Yīn jiānnìng xiànhài，Lín Chōng bèi cìpèi cāngzhōu。

他非但不承认自己的犯罪事实，反诬被人陷害。
Tā fēidàn bùchéngrèn zìjǐ de fànzuì shìshí，fǎnwū bèi rén xiànhài。
He denied the charge and made a countercharge.
他这样陷害朋友，简直是狗彘不若。
Tā zhèyàng xiànhài péngyou，jiǎnzhí shì gǒuzhì búruò。
Behavior like framing his friends makes him even worse that a dog or pig.
他被群小陷害，遭到了不公正对待。
Tā bèi qúnxiǎo xiànhài，zāodào le bùgōngzhèng duìdài。
He was framed by a group of mean people, and received unfair treatment.
被陷害
bèixiànhài
be framed
当年人家救过他的命，现在他却陷害人家，真是个白眼儿狼！
奸臣进谗，陷害忠良。
遭歹人陷害
假造罪名陷害好人。
罗织罪名陷害好人。
遭人陷害。
蓄意陷害。
栽赃陷害。
当事人追述自己被陷害的经过。
He was framed up by the rival political group.
Tā shì bèi duìshǒu zhèngzhì jítuán xiànhài de。
他是被对手政治集团陷害的。
The defendant claimed he was set up by the police.
Gāi bèi gào shēng chēng ，tā shì bèi jǐngchá xiànhài de。
该被告声称，他是被警察陷害的。
The innocent man was framed by the police.
Zhège wúgū de rén bèi jǐngchá xiànhài le。
这个无辜的人被警察陷害了。
Some of the scientists were exposed to harmful radiation during the testing.
Cèshì zhōng，yìxiē kēxuéjiā xiànrù yǒuhài fúshè de xiǎnjìng。
测试中，一些科学家陷入有害辐射的险境。
All his childhood he had been frightened of his own shortcomings.
Tā de zhěnggè tóngnián dōu zài wèi tā zìjǐ de quēxiàn gǎndào hàipà。
他的整个童年都在为他自己的缺陷感到害怕。

Dìmiàn āoxiàn。

双颊凹陷
shuāngjiá āoxiàn
have sunken (or hollow) cheeks
陷于被动地位
xiànyú bèidòng dìwèi 
land oneself in a passive position; be thrown into passivity
说话不留余地往往会陷入被动。
Shuōhuà bùliú yúdì wǎngwǎnghuì xiànrù bèidòng。
You\'ll land yourself in a difficult position if you make no allowances in your statement.
陷入沉思之中
xiànrù chénsī zhī zhōng 
be lost in thought; be deep in meditation
地震后路基沉陷了。
Dìzhèn hòu lùjī chénxiàn le。
The earthquake made the roadbed cave in.

xiànrù chóngchóngbāowéi zhī zhōng

我们的车陷在泥坑里，车轮直打滑。

Our car got stuck in the mud and the wheels just skidded around.

duò rù xiànjǐng

xiànrù jīhánjiāopò de kùnnan jìngdì

xiànrù wánquán gūlì de jìngdì

xiànyú juédì

luózhī wūxiàn

Hàncháo de mièwángshǐ Zhōngguó xiànrù le fēnliè de júmiàn。

xiànrù níkēng

xiànrù nínìng

xiànrù qióngkùn de jìngdì

shèjì xiànhài

xiànshēn hǔkǒu

xiànyú ɡūlì
find oneself isolated
陷阱
xiànjǐng
pitfall; pit; trap; snare
缺陷
quēxiàn
defect; drawback; flaw; blemish
你的车该打气了，轮胎都瘪陷下去了。
Nǐ de chē gāi dǎqì le，lúntāi dōu biěxiàn xiàqù le。
You should go and pump your tires, they are already flat.
因奸佞陷害，林冲被刺配沧州。
Yīn jiānnìng xiànhài，Lín Chōng bèi cìpèi cāngzhōu。
After being set up by crafty sycophants, LInchong was tattooed on the face and sent into exile.
可叹罗成一世英名，到最后被苏烈乱箭攒射死于陷马坑。
Kětàn Luó Chéng yíshì yīngmíng，dào zuìhòu bèi Sū Liè luànjiàn zǎnshè sǐ yú xiànmǎkēng。
Although Luocheng had an illustrious life, he was shot dead in a horse pit by a volley of arrows fired by Sulie.
不摧陷廓清这些老观念，我们的改革就会有阻力。
Bù cuīxiàn kuòqīng zhèxiē lǎoguānniàn，wǒmen de gǎigé jiùhuì yǒu zǔlì。
There will be obstructions for our reform if these old concepts are not completely cleared away.
由于年代久远，这个房屋的地基开始低陷了。
Yóuyú niándài jiǔyuǎn，zhège fángwū de dìjī kāishǐ dīxiàn le。
The foundations of this house are beginning to sink due to its old age.
过分的开采地下水，会造成地面下陷。
Guòfèn de kāicǎi dìxiàshuǐ，huì zàochéng dìmiàn xiàxiàn。
Overexploiting underground water will cause land subsidence.
地震发生的时候，天塌地陷。
Dìzhèn fāshēng de shíhou，tiāntā dìxiàn。
When earthquakes happen, it seems that the sky and the earth are sinking.
他非但不承认自己的犯罪事实，反诬被人陷害。
Tā fēidàn bùchéngrèn zìjǐ de fànzuì shìshí，fǎnwū bèi rén xiànhài。
He denied the charge and made a countercharge.
他这样陷害朋友，简直是狗彘不若。
Tā zhèyàng xiànhài péngyou，jiǎnzhí shì gǒuzhì búruò。
Behavior like framing his friends makes him even worse that a dog or pig.
他被小人构陷，含冤而死。
Tā bèi xiǎorén gòuxiàn,hányuān ér sǐ.
He was framed by a villain and died with false charges.
陷入困境的她孤立无援，只能靠自己了。
Xiànrù kùnjìng de tā gūlì wúyuán，zhǐnéng kào zìjǐ le。
Being caught in a dilemma, she is cut off from help and has to rely on herself.
你不要被事情的假相所蒙敝，掉入坏人的陷阱里。
Nǐ búyào bèi shìqing de jiǎ xiàng suǒ méngbì，diàorù huàirén de xiànjǐng lǐ。
Keep yourself from being misled by the disguises of bad people, so you won\'t fall into their traps.
这道难题使他双眉紧锁，陷入深深的思考。
Zhè dào nántí shǐ tā shuāngméi jǐnsuǒ，xiànrù shēnshēn de sīkǎo。
He frowned at the difficult question and got lost in thought.
面对各种消费陷阱，消费者可要看紧自己的钱包。
Miànduì gèzhǒng xiāofèi xiànjǐng，xiāofèizhě kěyào kānjǐn zìjǐ de qiánbāo。
Faced with various consumption traps, consumers should keep a close watch over their purses.
这种陷阱可以猎捕到小型的野兽。
Zhèzhǒng xiànjǐng kěyǐ lièbǔ dào xiǎoxíng de yěshòu。
The trap can captue small wild animals.
小偷被当场抓住后，便企图谋陷他身边的人。
Xiǎotōu bèi dāngchǎng zhuāzhù hòu，biàn qǐtú móuxiàn tā shēnbiān de rén。
After being caught in red, the thief attempted to plot a frame-up against people around.
他一直有生理缺陷，对自己的朋友也难以启齿。
Tā yìzhí yǒu shēnglǐ quēxiàn，duì zìjǐ de péngyou yě nányǐ qǐchǐ。
He has a physical defect, and is too shy to speak out even to his friends.
连续地熬夜使她眼窝内陷，憔悴了许多。
Liánxù de áoyè shǐ tā yǎnwō nèixiàn，qiáocuì le xǔduō。
She had sunken eyes through staying up day after day, and looked haggard.
内陷是一个中医学术语，它表示的是人的某种体质或病状。
Nèixiàn shì yígè zhōng yīxué shùyǔ，tā biǎoshì de shì rén de mǒuzhǒng tǐzhì huò bìngzhuàng。
缺嘴并不是大缺陷，完全可以通过手术矫治。
Quēzuǐ bìng búshì dà quēxiàn，wánquán kěyǐ tōngguò shǒushù jiǎozhì。
A harelip is not a big defect, it can be remedied through an operation.
他被群小陷害，遭到了不公正对待。
Tā bèi qúnxiǎo xiànhài，zāodào le bùgōngzhèng duìdài。
He was framed by a group of mean people, and received unfair treatment.
他深陷在失去亲人的痛苦之中，无法自拔。
Tā shēnxiàn zài shīqù qīnrén de tòngkǔ zhī zhōng，wúfǎzìbá。
He couldn\'t disengage himself from the pain of losing his family.
地震后不少地方都发生了坍陷。
Dìzhèn hòu bùshǎo dìfāng dōu fāshēng le tānxiàn。
After the earthquake, many places had collapsed.
前面是块滩地，不要轻易的落脚，以免陷下去。
Qiánmiàn shì kuài tāndì，búyào qīngyì de luòjiǎo，yǐmiǎn xiàn xiàqù。
Ahead of us is a beach. Be careful, or you may sink into it.
这场比赛他已竭尽全力，却一直陷于险局。
Zhèchǎng bǐsài tā yǐ jiéjìn quánlì，què yìzhí xiànyú xiǎnjú。
He has already tried his best but still can not get out of the difficult situation.
每当冲锋陷阵时，我们的战士都十分勇敢。
Měidāng chōngfèng xiànzhèn shí，wǒmen de zhànshì dōu shífēn yǒnggǎn。
Our soldiers are very brave in fighting battles.
他和老婆陷入了儿子抚养权的争夺战中。
Tā hé lǎopó xiànrù le érzi fǔyǎngquán de zhēngduózhàn zhōng。
He and his wife are fighting for the right to support their son.
世界上没有完美无缺的人，每个人都会有各种缺陷和不足。
Shìjièshàng méiyǒu wánměiwúquē de rén，měi gè rén dōuhuì yǒu gèzhǒng quēxiàn hé búzú。
There is no perfect person in the world, everyone has their own shortcomings.
被陷害
bèixiànhài
be framed
他陷入了沉思。
Tā xiànrùle chénsī。

Tā juéxīn yào zǒu，wǒmen yě bùhǎo zǔlán。
As he was determined to go, we thought it better not to stop him.
冲破各种阻力
chōngpò gèzhǒng zǔlì 
break through all kinds of obstructions
空气阻力
kōngqì zǔlì 
air resistance
摩擦阻力
mócā zǔlì 
friction drag
阻留误点的乘客
zǔliú wùdiǎn de chéngkè 
held-up, delayed passengers
条约的履行受到了阻挠。
Tiáoyuē de lǚxíngshòudào le zǔnáo。
The execution of the treaty was obstructed.
阻尼器
zǔníqì 
damper
阻尼振荡
zǔní zhèndànɡ 
damped oscillation
交通阻塞。
jiāotōngzǔsè
The traffic is held up. or There\'s a traffic jam.
阻止事态的恶化
zǔzhǐ shìtài de èhuà 
prevent the situation from deteriorating
别阻止他，让他去吧。
Bié zǔzhǐ tā，ràng tā qù ba。
Don\'t try to stop him. Let him go.
他们推三阻四，正好暴露了他们做贼心虚。
Tāmen tuīsānzǔsì，zhènghǎo bàolù le tāmen zuòzéi xīnxū。
In making so many excuses, they revealed their own guilty conscience.
阻挠
zǔnáo
obstruct; thwart; stand in the way; put a spoke in sb.\'s wheel
推三阻四
tuīsānzǔsì
decline with all sorts of excuses; give the runaround
拦阻
lánzǔ
block; hold back; obstruct
险阻
xiǎnzǔ
(of roads) dangerous and difficult
八国联军在进攻北京之前，曾遭到清军和义和团的有力阻击。
Bāguóliánjūn zài jìngōng Běijīng zhīqián，céng zāodào qīngjūn hé yìhétuán de yǒulì zǔjī。
The Allied Forces of Eight Powers had to deal with rigorous resistence from the Qing government\'s army, and the Boxers before they took Beijing.
这些顽固的保皇势力对新政进行种种的阻挠。
Zhèxiē wángù de bǎohuáng shìlì duì xīnzhèng jìnxíng zhǒng zhǒng de zǔnáo。
Those hard-core royalists did everything they could to sabotage the new policy.
通过拨动变阻器，可以改变电流。
Tōngguò bōdòng biànzǔqì，kěyǐ gǎibiàn diànliú。
By adjusting the rheostat, one can change the current in a circuit.
有了这张通行证，你就可以畅行无阻了。
Yǒu le zhèzhāng tōngxíngzhèng，nǐ jiù kěyǐ chàngxíngwúzǔ le。
You can go to any place with this password card.
不摧陷廓清这些老观念，我们的改革就会有阻力。
Bù cuīxiàn kuòqīng zhèxiē lǎoguānniàn，wǒmen de gǎigé jiùhuì yǒu zǔlì。
There will be obstructions for our reform if these old concepts are not completely cleared away.

Local protectionism is severely blocking healthy development of the economy
士兵在堞墙上阻击来犯的敌兵。
Shìbīng zài diéqiáng shàng zǔjī láifàn de díbīng。
Soldiers are defending against the attacking enemies at the parapet wall.
战场上，他们再一次成功遏阻了敌军的围攻。
Zhànchǎng shàng，tāmen zài yícì chénggōng èzǔ le díjūn de wéigōng。
They successfully resisted the onslaught of the enemy.
这里常年风魔肆虐，交通时常受阻。
Zhèlǐ chángnián fēngmó sìnüè，jiāotōng shícháng shòuzǔ。
The strong wind here often causes trouble to traffic.
别妻千里音书断，关山阻隔两心悬。
Biéqī qiānlǐ yīnshū duàn，guānshān zǔgé liǎngxīn xuán。
The husband is thousands of miles away from his wife and can\'t send letters to his wife because they are cut off by the mountains. This couple worry about each other all the time.
认定了这条路就要坚定地走下去，遇到什么艰难险阻也绝不回还。
Rèndìng le zhètiáo lù jiùyào jiāndìng de zǒu xiàqù，yùdào shénme jiānnán xiǎnzǔ yě juébùhuíhuán。
Once you have decided the way to go, you should move forward without hesitation. Whatever hardship you may be confronted with, you should never return to the starting point.
他俩不顾门卫的阻拦，径行向这里走来。
Tā liǎ búgù ménwè de zǔlán，jìngxíng xiàng zhèlǐ zǒulái。
They walked straight over here, regardless of the guards\' objections.
实验证明在接近绝对零度的时候，导体的电阻将接近于零。

According to the experiment, when the temperature gets close to absolute zero, the resistance of the electric conductor approaches zero.
那道峻岭就像天然的险关，曾经成功阻止过敌人的进攻。
Nà dào jùnlǐng jiù xiàng tiānrán de xiǎnguān，céngjīng chénggōng zǔzhǐ guò dírén de jìngōng。
That high and steep mountain is like a natural defense and has successfully hindered the enemy attacks.
由于天气原因他们被困阻在山上了。
Yóuyú tiānqì yuányīn tāmen bèi kùnzǔ zài shān shàng le。
They were cooped up on the mountain due to bad weather.
他们两厢情愿，你又何必阻拦呢？
Tāmen liǎngxiāng qíngyuàn，nǐ yòu hébì zǔlán ne？
Since they love each other, there is no need for you to discourage them.
爷爷的脑血管有些阻塞，必须常吃活血的药。

Grandpa\'s blood vessel on the brain is a little blocked, so he must often take blood-activating medicine.
设若我早一点赶来，大概就能及时阻止这场争端了。
Shèruò wǒ zǎo yì diǎn gǎnlai，dàgài jiùnéng jíshí zǔzhǐ zhèchǎng zhēngduān le。
If I had come here earlier, I might have prevented this dispute in time.
你想要阻止这件事情，简直就是螳臂挡车、自不量力。

You want to prevent this from happening? You have undoubtedly overrated yourself.
下水道被脏物淤阻了，污水流得满地都是。
Xiàshuǐdào bèi zāngwù yūzǔ le，wūshuǐ liú de mǎndì dōushì。
The sewer is silted up by foulness, and the waste water is everywhere on the ground.
由于交通阻塞，他早自习迟到了。

The commander sent out troops to stop the enemy\'s backup troops.

知道他是司令员的儿子后，对方不再阻难他。

After realizing that he was the son of the commander, the other side stopped making things difficult for him.
现在许多的木地板都具有阻燃这个功能。
Xiànzài xǔduō de mùdìbǎn dōu jùyǒu zǔrán zhège gōngnéng。
Now, many wooden floors are nonflammable.

The doctors used lidocaine to stop the transmission of nerves that sense pain.

电阻与电流成反比。

jílì quànzǔ 
try very hard to dissuade sb. from doing sth.
你最好劝阻他别那样干。

劝阻
Quànzǔ
dissuade from

mócā zǔlì

流线型机器在克服空气阻力时所需能量要相对少些。
Engineers will work to correct the effects or air resistance.
Gōngchéngshīmen huì qù xiāochú gèzhǒng bùliáng zuòyòng huòzhě kōngqì zǔlì。
工程师们会去消除各种不良作用或者空气阻力。

jiāotōngzǔsè
The traffic is held up. or There\'s a traffic jam.
由于交通阻塞，他早自习迟到了。

Since he strained his foot when he was playing basketball, it\'s been hard for him to move a few steps.

细枝末节
Many details still have to be sorted out.

有很多细枝末节还有待整理。
The two sides were fencing over a few minor details of the contract.

双方为合同中的一些细枝末节争论不休。
那些从来不结果的疯枝要修剪掉，这样才能让其它枝条更好地开花结果。
Nàxiē cónglái bùjiéguǒ de fēngzhī yào xiūjiǎn diào，zhèyàng cáinéng ràng qítā zhītiáo gènghǎo de kāihuā jiéguǒ。
We must cut the stems which bear no fruit to make room for other stems to bear fruits.

héngshēngzhījié

他要真炒你鱿鱼，你就干脆另择高枝算了。

The branches of scrambling string beans are able to climb onto a vegetable stand.
这两棵树的枝干交合在一起生长了多年。

The branches of these two trees have extended into each others are for many years.

Zhèxiē kūzhī kěyǐ náhuíjiā dāng cháishāo！

只听啪啦一声，树枝被大风吹折了。

The yellow leaves on the trees show that late Autumn approaches.

从树上剪掉枯枝

in minute detail
细枝末节
Pruning is important to encourage flowering and maintain the shape of your plant.
剪枝在促进开花和保持植物形状方面有重要作用。
The gardener trimmed lots of branches off the tree.
园丁剪掉了树上的很多树枝。
Buddleias die down each winter in the north but bloom from new wood the next season.
在北方，醉鱼草每年冬天枯萎，但来年又重新生枝开花。

应将这些枝丫修剪整齐。
The twigs bent under the pressure, then splintered with a tearing crack.
Bèi yā wān de xì zhī suízhe pīpā yìshēng duànliè le。
被压弯的细枝随着劈啪一声断裂了。
They climbed upon the tree branches.
Tāmen páshàngle shùzhī。
他们爬上了树枝。
Many details still have to be sorted out.
Yǒu hěn duō xìzhīmòjié hái yǒudài zhěnglǐ。
有很多细枝末节还有待整理。
The branches were dressed by hand.
Shǒugōng xiūjiǎn shùzhī。
手工修剪树枝。
The leaves are egg-shaped and grow alternate on thin branch.
Yèzi chéng dàn yuánxíng，hù shēng zài xì zhī shàng。
叶子呈蛋圆形，互生在细枝上。
I can see a new branch sprouting from the tree stump.
Wǒ kěyǐ kàndào yì gēn xīn zhīyā cóng shùzhuāng shàng màochūlái。
我可以看到一根新枝丫从树桩上冒出来。
The stream next to the old garage was becoming blocked with tree branches.
Jiù chēkù pángbiān de nà tiáo xīliú bèi shùzhī zǔduàn le。
旧车库旁边的那条溪流被树枝阻断了。
The arrows pierced the knights and their horses, which trampled and bolted.

Wǒmen kǎn guāng le shùshàng de shùzhī。
我们砍光了树上的树枝。

Shùzhī jīzhòngle tā de liǎn，tā shuāidǎo le。
树枝击中了她的脸，她摔倒了。
They clearcut trees in the winter and coaled the logs the following spring.

Many shoots develop from its stem, which sometimes grows horizontally.

许多嫩枝从主干生发出来，有时还水平生长。
The trees began to shoot new buds and leaves.

Toads, when they seize one end of a worm, methodically rake the length of it to remove any sticks or earth that might be stuck to it.
Chánchú zài zhuāzhù chóngzi de yìduān hòu，tā huì xìtǒng de sǎoshì tā de chángdù，yǐbiàn chúqù zhānzài chóngzi shēnshàng de shùzhī huòzhě nítǔ。

The two sides were fencing over a few minor details of the contract.

双方为合同中的一些细枝末节争论不休。
Dead wood should be cut out, allowing adjacent healthy growth to fill the gap.

简洁生动的语言
jiǎnjié shēngdòng de yǔyán 
terse and lively language
文笔简洁
wénbǐ jiǎnjié 
written in a pithy style
这件褂子更适合钉暗扣儿，显得简洁。
Zhèjiàn guàzi gèng shìhé dìng ànkòur，xiǎnde jiǎnjié。
Hidden bottons would be better for this jacket. They give a simple look.
你应当去掉“穿靴戴帽”的东西，尽量做到语言简洁。
Nǐ yīngdāng qùdiào“chuānxuē dàimào”de dōngxi，jìnliàng zuòdào yǔyán jiǎnjié。
You should get rid of the clichés and try to make it pithy.
繁芜的文字最好删减，这样文章才会显得简洁。

Tā zài xíjiān tántǔ gāoyǎ。

他在浴室里吐得满地都是。

Tā duì jiǔxí yǐjí hòulái de ǒutù wánquán méi yìnxiàng le。
他对酒席以及后来的呕吐完全没印象了。
The vomit is bloodstained and looks like coffee grounds.

Tā zài hēle tàiduō píjiǔ hòu，ǒutù le。
他在喝了太多啤酒后，呕吐了。

Tā bǎ gāng tūnxiàqù de yào dōu tǔle chūlái。
他把刚吞下去的药都吐了出来。

Nǐ bǎ tuòmo tùjìn chá lǐ。
你把唾沫吐进茶里。

He turned aside to a doorway and vomited.
Tā zhuǎnxiàng yìbiān，zài ménkǒu ǒutù。

xīnwén méitǐ

她以急智睿语回击了媒体的攻击。

所有的媒体都对这次大地震做了充分的报道。

主流媒体上充斥着尖锐的批评。
The national media published the information about the toxic dairy.
国家的媒体发布了关于有毒牛奶的报道。
The project pursues against great media criticism.
顶着媒体的大肆批评，这个项目继续进行着。
His strong advocacy on upholding certain time-tested Asian values, as being superior to those of the West, further alienated him to their media.
他极力提倡一些历久不衰的亚洲价值观，认为它们比西方价值观优越，这后来也加深了西方媒体和他的隔阂。
The leader of a country is often vulnerable to the public media.
国家领导人常常易受媒体的抨击。
The press trumpeted another defeat for the government.
Méitǐ dàlì xuānyáng zhèngfǔ de yòu yí bàijì。
媒体大力宣扬政府的又一败绩。
John was as diplomatic as Mary when talking to the press.
Yuēhàn zài yǔ méitǐ dǎjiāodào shí hé Mǎlì yíyàng lǎoliàn。
约翰在与媒体打交道时和玛丽一样老练。
Usually the media couldn\'t be counted on to maintain a discreet silence about those things.
Tōngcháng láishuō，méitǐ shì bù kěnéng duì nàxiē shìqing bǎochí zhōudào de chénmò。
通常来说，媒体是不可能对那些事情保持周到的沉默。
The analysis of a media text means studying its narrative structure.
Duì méitǐ zhèngwén de fēnxī shìzhǐ yánjiū qí xùshì jiégòu。
对媒体正文的分析是指研究其叙事结构。
The press asked the President a battery of questions about the latest scandal.
Méitǐ xiàng zǒngtǒng tíchūle yìxiē guānyú zuìjìn chǒuwén de wèntí。
媒体向总统提出了一些关于最近丑闻的问题。
American conservatives often complain about what they see as the liberal bias of the media.
Měiguó bǎoshǒupài jīngcháng bàoyuàn tāmen suǒ kàndào de shì méitǐ de zìyóuzhǔyì piānjiàn。
美国保守派经常抱怨他们所看到的是媒体的自由主义偏见。
Mass media has increased the exposure and power of celebrity.

大众媒体增加了名人的曝光率和影响力。
A spokesman was quick to contradict this statement to the press.
Yí gè fāyánrén hěn kuài chūlái xiàng méitǐ fǒurènle zhège shuōfǎ。
一个发言人很快出来向媒体否认了这个说法。
The event caused considerable controversy in the media.

They had a cozy agreement with the press.

他们和媒体之间有某种默契。

创意小组然后就着手将他们的想法在挑选出来的媒体上付诸实践。
The course combines historical and critical analysis of the mass media.
Zhè mén kèchéng jiéhéle duì dàzhòng méitǐ de lìshǐ hé pínglùnxìng fēnxī。
这门课程结合了对大众媒体的历史和评论性分析。
The royal family\'s winter fortress, was also surrounded by the media.
Huángshì jiāzú dōngjì bǎolěi yě bèi méitǐ tuántuán wéizhù。
皇室家族冬季堡垒也被媒体团团围住。
Political awareness was further heightened by the press.

The judge premised his decision for the press.

The announcement provoked a storm of criticism in the press.

这个事件引起了媒体和公众要求总统辞职。

书籍、杂志和其它媒体都被列在同一个名单上。
The local press seems to have been remarkably indifferent to the event.

当地的媒体似乎对这起事件毫不关心。
This sort of partnership between schools was always of interest to the local press.

Different elements of the media perform different functions.

媒体的不同部分执行不同的功能。

The capital necessary to support an independent press is lacking.

信的内容被泄露给了媒体。

The usher marshalled people into the public and press galleries.

他在所有媒体的注视下被赶出大厅。
The media were quick to seize on this, not for an instant doubting their guilt.

Tā tūrán tíng xiàlái huángùsìzhōu，huíwàngzhe gānggāng cóng zhōng jǐ chūlái de rénqún。
他突然停下来环顾四周，回望着刚刚从中挤出来的人群。
The word was ground out between Peggy\'s teeth.
Zhège cí cóng Pèijí de yáfèng lǐ jǐ chūlái。
这个词从佩吉的牙缝里挤出来。
He turned to find the hunters huddled together.

他转过身，发现猎人们都挤在一起。

Tāmen jǐzài yìqǐ，dǐyù hánfēng。

I found myself jammed in between the stern and rudder.

我发现自己挤在船尾和船舵中间。
We jammed into a lift.
Wǒmen jǐjìnle diàntī。
我们挤进了电梯。
I\'ve jammed it on again and gave it a good squeeze.

我又猛压它，好好挤了一下。
We jammed together, shoulder-to-shoulder, in the narrow confines.

a good judge of music
音乐的好欣赏家
no music in his soul
他没有音乐欣赏力(或他没有音乐细胞)
He took me out to see the sights.
他带我出去欣赏了风景。
I could stay here admiring these paintings for hours.
我可以待在这儿几个小时一直欣赏这些画儿。
I\'m not staring at you, I was only admiring your new shirt.
我没有盯着你看，只是在欣赏你的新T恤。
I have never really appreciated the actual beauty of snakes before so this is all new to me.
这之前我从未真正欣赏过蛇的美丽，对我来说这可是全新的体验。
This year 72,000 fans will see the cream of the heavy metal scene.
今年，72000名歌迷将欣赏到重金属乐队的精选曲目。
We watched a spectacular sunset at the beach.
我们在海边欣赏了非常壮观的日落。
I\'ll pull back the curtains so you can enjoy the view.
我去把窗帘拉开一点儿，你就可以好好欣赏风景了。
I enjoy listening to the music that floats through the open windows.
我喜欢欣赏窗外飘来的音乐。
He was already on slow cruise mode and doing 60 kph enjoying the view.
他已经设置了每小时60公里的低速巡航模式，这样就可以欣赏沿途风景了。
to have an ear for language/music
有语言/音乐欣赏能力
The novel design of the theatre wins the appreciation of all the people.
人们都很欣赏这个剧场的新颖设计。
I have always enjoyed their fellowship.
Wǒ yìzhí hěn xīnshǎng tāmen jiān de yǒuyì。
我一直很欣赏他们间的友谊。
Looking backwards with either envy or merely admiration tends to distort history.
Huígù lìshǐ，wúlùn shì dùjì háishì xīnshǎng wǎngwǎng dōuhuì wāiqū lìshǐ。
回顾历史，无论是妒忌还是欣赏往往都会歪曲历史。
My father stood in the driveway, admiring his new sports car.
Wǒ fùqīn zhànzài chēdào shàng，xīnshǎngzhe tā de xīn pǎochē。
我父亲站在车道上，欣赏着他的新跑车。
Architects have always appreciated the beauty and aesthetic appeal of buildings.
Jiànzhùshī men zǒngshì xīnshǎng lóufáng de měi hé yìshù xiàoguǒ。
建筑师们总是欣赏楼房的美和艺术效果。
Come and join in the fun and see the art of shooting the bow or combat with the sword.
Yíkuàir lái wánwán bā，xīnshǎng yíxià shèjiàn huòzhě jījiàn de jìyì。
一块儿来玩玩吧，欣赏一下射箭或者击剑的技艺。
There were also some notable breakthrough performances to enjoy.
Yě yǒu yìxiē yǐnrénzhùmù de tūpòxìng biǎoyǎn gōng xīnshǎng。
也有一些引人注目的突破性表演供欣赏。
All the cast were brilliant, and we really enjoyed the show.
Yǎnyuán zhènróng fēicháng qiángdà，wǒmen shífēn xīnshǎng zhège jiémù。
演员阵容非常强大，我们十分欣赏这个节目。
I cannot appreciate the natural beauty that surrounds me.
Wǒ wúfǎ xīnshǎng wǒ shēnchǔqízhōng de zìrán měijǐng。
我无法欣赏我身处其中的自然美景。
Joking apart, I really appreciate this sort of help.
Rènzhēn de shuō，wǒ zhēn de hěn xīnshǎng zhè zhǒng xíngshì de bāngzhù。
认真地说，我真的很欣赏这种形式的帮助。
We might just as well have enjoyed the view of the river without the litter.
Xīnshǎng méiyǒu lājī de xiǎohé fēngjǐng yě búcuò。
欣赏没有垃圾的小河风景也不错。
The more I see of men, the more I admire dogs.
Yuè hé rén zài yìqǐ，wǒ jiù yuè shì xīnshǎng gǒu。
越和人在一起，我就越是欣赏狗。
I enjoyed your speech the other day.
Qián jǐ tiān wǒ xīnshǎngle nǐ de yǎnjiǎng。
前几天我欣赏了你的演讲。
The housemate wanders over to the window and surveys the scene.
Shìyǒu zài chuāngbiān mànbù，xīnshǎng měijǐng。
室友在窗边漫步，欣赏美景。
Appreciation will not come without effort.
Xīnshǎng hěn róngyì jiù néng chǎnshēng。
欣赏很容易就能产生。
He admired her long graceful neck.
Tā xīnshǎng tā xiūcháng de bózi。
他欣赏她修长的脖子。
She didn\'t appreciate my humor.
Tā bù xīnshǎng wǒ de yōumò。
她不欣赏我的幽默。
He enjoyed the solemn externals of religion.
Tā xīnshǎng zōngjiào shēnghuó zhuāngzhòng de wàizài biǎoxiàn。
他欣赏宗教生活庄重的外在表现。
He admired the gold of her hair.
Tā xīnshǎng tā de yìtóu jīnfà。
他欣赏她的一头金发。
He subjected me to his awful poetry.
Tā ràng wǒ“xīnshǎng”tā xiàrén de shīzuò。
他让我“欣赏”他吓人的诗作。
They stood on high and observed the countryside.
Tāmen zhànzài gāochù xīnshǎng xiāngcūn fēngjǐng。
他们站在高处欣赏乡村风景。
Without understanding the finer nuances you can\'t enjoy the humor.
Bù lǐjiě nàxiē jí xìwēi de chābié，jiù wúfǎ xīnshǎng nàgè yōumò。
不理解那些极细微的差别，就无法欣赏那个幽默。
I appreciated his follow-through on his promise.
Wǒ xīnshǎng tā duì qí nuòyán jiānchí dàodǐ de jīngshén。
我欣赏他对其诺言坚持到底的精神。
He enjoyed the complexity of modern computers.
Tā hěn xīnshǎng xiàndài jìsuànjī de fùzáxìng。
他很欣赏现代计算机的复杂性。
He admired the ampleness of its proportions.
Tā shífēn xīnshǎng tā pángdà de fènliàng。
他十分欣赏它庞大的分量。
I admired his buoyancy and persistent good humor.
Wǒ hěn xīnshǎng tā qīngsōng kuàilè de yàngzi yǐjí yíguàn de yōumò zuòfēng。
我很欣赏他轻松快乐的样子以及一贯的幽默作风。
I shall not dignify this insensitive remark with an answer.
Wǒ bú huì xīnshǎng zhèzhǒng háowú liàngdiǎn de huídá。
我不会欣赏这种毫无亮点的回答。
一派欣欣向荣的景象
yí pài xīnxīn xiàng róng de jǐng xiàng
a picture of prosperity
一派蒸蒸日上、欣欣向荣的景象
yí pài zhēngzhēngrìshàng、xīnxīn xiàng róng de jǐng xiàng 
a scene of prosperity
新建设的开发区，一片欣欣向荣景象。
Xīn jiànshè de kāifāqū，yí piàn xīnxīn xiàng róng jǐng xiàng。
Everything looks very promising in the newly constructed development zone.
春天来了，草木荣华，真是一派欣欣向荣的景象。
Chūntiān lái le，cǎomù rónghuá，zhēnshì yípài xīnxīn xiàng róng de jǐng xiàng。
Spring has come, trees and grasses flourish, it\'s a flourishing scene.
小王肯定有什么喜事，看他欣欣然的。
Xiǎo Wáng kěndìng yǒu shénme xǐshì，kàn tā xīnxīnrán de。
Look at how happy Xiao Wang is, he must have got some good news.
欣然从命
xīnrán cóngmìng 
gladly comply with sb.\'s wish
现代音乐大多难以欣赏。
Xiàndài yīnyuè dàduō nányǐ xīnshǎng。
Most modern music is difficult to appreciate.
但凡过路的人，没有一个不停下来欣赏这儿的风景的。
Dànfán guòlù de rén，méiyǒu yígè bùtíng xiàlái xīnshǎng zhèr de fēngjǐng de。
Whoever passes here stops to admire the scenery.
得悉病体康复，不胜欣慰。
Déxī bìngtǐ kāngfù，búshèng xīnwèi。
I rejoice to hear of your recovery.
欣赏风景
xīnshǎng fēngjǐng
admire the scenery
捷报传来，全国人民无不欢欣鼓舞。
Jiébào chuánlái，quánguó rénmín wú bùhuānxīngǔwǔ。
The good tidings filled the whole nation with joy. or The good tidings elated the whole nation.
欢欣鼓舞地跨入了新的一年
huānxīngǔwǔ de kuàrù le xīn de yìnián
stride into the new year in high spirits

kāishè yīnyuè xīnshǎngkè
give (or offer) a course in music appreciation

XīnfēngMiánfǎngchǎngzāoyù tè dà huǒzāi，bǎoxiǎn gōngsī lǐpéi liǎngqiānwàn。
After the big fire,the Xinfeng Textile Factory received a settlement of 20 million yuan from insurance company.
欣然命笔
xīnrán mìnɡbǐ
gladly set pen to paper; be happy to start writing
欣逢佳节
xīn féngjiājié
on the happy occasion of the festival
欣然接受
xīnrán jiēshòu
accept with pleasure
欣然同意
xīnrán tóngyì
gladly consent; readily agree
音乐欣赏
yīnyuè xīnshǎng
music appreciation
我们对实验的成功感到欣慰。
Wǒmen duì shíyàn de chénggōnggǎndào xīnwèi。
We were gratified at the success of the experiment.
听说王涛即将学成归国，欣喜万分。
Tīngshuō WángTāo jíjiāngxuéchéngguīguó，xīnxǐwànfēn。
We are extremely glad to learn that Wang Tao will soon complete his studies abroad and return home.
他欣喜之情，形于辞色。
Tā xīnxǐ zhī qíng，xíngyúcísè。
There was joy in his words and on his face.
欣喜逾常
xīnxǐ yúchánɡ 
be overjoyed
欣然允诺
xīnrán yǔnnuò
readily consent
他喜欢四处欣赏榜额上的字画。
Tā xǐhuan sìchù xīnshǎng bǎng\'é shàng de zìhuà。
He loves to go about admiring the words and paintings on horizontal inscribed boards.
这次去湖南旅游，我们特意去欣赏了当地有名的采茶戏。
Zhècì qù Húnán lǚyóu，wǒmen tèyì qù xīnshǎng le dāngdì yǒumíng de cǎicháxì。
We watched the famous caicha opera when we went to Hunan Province for sightseeing.
我喜欢独自欣赏荷塘的月色。
Wǒ xǐhuan dúzì xīnshǎng hétáng de yuèsè。
I like enjoying the moonlight beside a lotus pond.
胜利的消息传来，人们都欢欣鼓舞。
Shènglì de xiāoxi chuánlái，rénmen dōu huānxīn gǔwǔ。
The news of victory came making the people joyful, and inspired.
本省出现了人才回流现象，真是让人欣慰。
Běnshěng chūxiàn le réncái huíliú xiànxiàng，zhēnshì ràng rén xīnwèi。
In this province, there appears the phenomenon of a gathering of talented people, which is really gratifying.
夜晚，我们将躺椅放在楼台上，躺着欣赏夜景。
Yèwǎn，wǒmen jiāng tǎngyǐ fàngzài lóutái shàng，tǎng zhe xīnshǎng yèjǐng。
We will move a deck chair onto the balcony to enjoy the view at night.
看着农田的庄稼露苗，他欣慰极了。
Kàn zhe nóngtián de zhuāngjià lòumiáo，tā xīnwèi jí le。
He is satisfied to see the sprouting of the crops.
国家取消了农业税，农民们无不欢欣鼓舞。
Guójiā qǔxiāo le nóngyèshuì，nóngmínmen wúbùhuānxīn gǔwǔ。
The government has cancelled agricultural taxes, all the farmers are jubilant.
他工作勤苦，老板很欣赏他。
Tā gōngzuò qínkǔ，lǎobǎn hěnxīnshǎng tā。
He is hard-working and appreciated by his boss.
他自幼喜欢看一些图籍，这点使父母深感欣慰。
Tā zì yòu xǐhuan kàn yìxiē tújí，zhè diǎn shǐ fùmǔ shēngǎn xīnwèi。
He has liked reading books since childhood, which makes his parents very gratified.
她对他充满了欣慕之情。
Tā duì tā chōngmǎn le xīnmù zhī qíng。
She is filled with admiration for him.
拥有笔记本电脑的人令人欣羡不已。
Yōngyǒu bǐjìběn diànnǎo de rén lìngrén xīnxiàn bùyǐ。
It is great to have a laptop.
他欣悦的心情溢于言表。
Tā xīnyuè de xīnqíng yìyú yánbiǎo。
His joy is obviously shown in his behavior.
阳春白雪不是谁都能欣赏的。
Yángchūn báixuě búshì shuí dōu néng xīnshǎng de。
Not everyone can enjoy highbrow art and literature.
每个人欣赏艺术品的口味不同。
Měigèrén xīnshǎng yìshùpǐn de kǒuwèi bùtóng.
Everyone has their own different taste in art.

xīnxǐruòkuáng
be wild with joy
老板欣然同意了我的请求。
Lǎobǎn xīnrán tóngyìle wǒ de qǐngqiú。
The boss gladly agreed to my request.

Péngyǒumen dōu fēicháng xīnshǎng tā de cáixué。
His friends all greatly admired his learning.

音乐欣赏力强

欣喜若狂，

入侵
rùqīn
invade; intrude; make an incursion; make inroads
这个弱小的国家最终打败了外军的入侵。

qīnrù lǐnɡhǎi

wàiguó zīběn de qīnrù
the invasion of foreign capital

入侵
rùqīn
invade; intrude; make an incursion; make inroads

qīnfàn zhùzuòquán

犯罪行为或侵害他人权利的举止是反社会的。
The Beatles\' label has sued Apple again.
披头士乐队再次起诉苹果电脑侵犯其商标权。
He usurped my rights.
Tā qīnzhànle wǒ de quánlì。
他侵占了我的权利。
He claimed a violation of his rights under the fifth amendment.
Tā shēngchēng tā zài xiànfǎ dì-wǔ xiūzhèng\'àn xià de quánlì shòudàole qīnfàn。
他声称他在宪法第五修正案下的权利受到了侵犯。
Don\'t just sit by while your rights are violated!
Nǐmen de quánlì yǐjīng bèi qīnfànle，búyào zhìruòwǎngwén！
你们的权利已经被侵犯了，不要置若罔闻！
This impinges on my rights as an individual.
Zhè qīnfànle wǒ de gèrén quánlì。
这侵犯了我的个人权利。
The neighbors intrude on your privacy.
Zhèxiē línjū qīnfànle nǐ de yǐnsīquán。
这些邻居侵犯了你的隐私权。
Their acts have formed a violence to the company\'s patent.
他们的行为已经侵犯了这个公司的专利权。
By the law of Scotland a proprietor or occupier is entitled to prevent any stranger from intruding on his land.
Zài Sūgélán de fǎlǜ zhōng，tǔdì de suǒyǒuzhě huò zhànyǒu zhě yǒuquán zǔzhǐ rènhé mòshēngrén qīnfàn tā de tǔdì。
在苏格兰的法律中，土地的所有者或占有者有权阻止任何陌生人侵犯他的土地。
帝国主义侵略者总是向被侵略国施展他们的炮舰外交。
Dìguózhǔyì qīnlüèzhě zǒngshì xiàng bèi qīnlüè guó shīzhǎn tāmen de pàojiàn wàijiāo。
Imperialistic aggressors always use gunboat diplomacy to invade countries.
侵略者到处残害无辜老百姓。
Qīnlüèzhě dàochù cánhài wúgū lǎobǎixìng。
Wherever they went the invaders slaughtered innocent civilians.
给侵略者以毁灭性打击
gěi qīnlüèzhě yǐ huǐmièxìngdǎjī 
deal the aggressors a crushing (or devastating) blow
抗击侵略者
kànɡjī qīnlüèzhě
resist the aggressors
历数侵略者的罪行
lìshǔ qīnlüèzhě de zuìxíng
enumerate the crimes of the aggressors
斩断侵略者的魔爪
zhǎnduàn qīnlüèzhě de mózhǎo
cut off the tentacles of the aggressors
士兵们冲出城去，与侵略者拼杀起来。
Shìbīngmen chōngchū chéngqù，yǔ qīnlüèzhě pīnshā qǐlái。
The soldiers charged out of the city and fiercely engaged the invaders.
世界舆论谴责侵略者的挑衅。
Shìjiè yúlùn qiǎnzé qīnlüèzhě de tiǎoxìn。
World opinion condemned the aggressor\'s provocation.
侵略者
qīnlüèzhě
aggressor; invader
驱逐侵略者
qūzhú qīnlüèzhě
drive out the aggressors
这等于是给侵略者输血打气。
Zhè děngyú shì gěi qīnlüèzhě shūxuè dǎqì。
This is tantamount to giving the aggressor a shot in the arm.
游击队长期在山区和侵略者周旋。
Yóujīduì chángqī zài shānqū hé qīnlüèzhě zhōuxuán。
For a long time, the guerrillas fought the invaders in hilly country.
助长侵略者的野心
zhùzhǎngqīnlüèzhě de yěxīn 
whet the ambitions of the aggressors
这份笔供揭露了侵略者的暴行。
Zhè fèn bǐgòng jiēlòu le qīnlüèzhě de bàoxíng。
His written confession discloses the ferocity of the invaders.
这个部族对于比自己强大的侵略者毫不屈服，顽强战斗。
Zhège bùzú duìyú bǐ zìjǐ qiángdà de qīnlüèzhě háobùqūfú，wánqiáng zhàndòu。
This tribe refused to yield to the powerful invaders, and fought bravely.
侵略者的残虐的行径，激起了当地民众的反抗。
Qīnlüèzhě de cánnüè de xíngjìng，jīqǐ le dāngdì mínzhòng de fǎnkàng。
The intruders\' tyrannical behavior led the local people to revolt.
那些侵略者就像匪盗，疯狂地掠夺别人的财产。
Nàxiē qīnlüèzhě jiù xiàng fěidào，fēngkuáng de lüěduó biérén de cáichǎn。
The invaders were like robbers and thieves who plundered other people\'s possessions.
那些侵略者坑杀无辜百姓的罪行，我们绝不能忘记。
Nàxiē qīnlüèzhě kēngshā wúgū bǎixìng de zuìxíng，wǒmen jué bùnéng wàngjì。
We\'ll never forget that those invaders murdered people by burying them alive.
侵略者掳夺走了很多的文物珍品。
Qīnlüèzhě lǔduó zǒu le hěnduō de wénwù zhēnpǐn。
The invaders pillaged many cultural relics and treasures.
侵略者的暴行引发了人民战争的高潮。
Qīnlüèzhě de bàoxíng yǐnfā le rénmín zhànzhēng de gāocháo。
The aggressors\' atrocities aroused a surge in the people\'s war.
侵略者遭到了各地团练的顽强抵抗。
Qīnlüèzhě zāodào le gè dì tuánliàn de wánqiáng dǐkàng。
Invaders encountered dogged defense by local armies organized by landlords all over the country.
侵略者遭到了当地乡勇的攻击。
Qīnlüèzhě zāodào le dàngdì xiāngyǒng de gōngjī。
The invaders are attacked by local military groups.
侵略者来势汹汹，我们要尽快想好应敌之策。
Qīnlüèzhě láishì xiōngxiōng，wǒmen yào jǐnkuài xiǎnghǎo yìngdí zhī cè。
The invaders attacked in full fury, and we must think out a strategy to deal with them.
如果侵略者再犯，我们会誓死抵抗！
Rúguǒ qīnlüèzhě zàifàn，wǒmen huì shìsǐ dǐkàng！
If the invaders dare to come once again, we swear to fight against them until the last minute.
游击队经过几年的斗争终于打败了侵略者。
Yóujīduì jīngguò jǐnián de dòuzhēng zhōng yú dǎbài le qīnlüèzhě。
After several years of struggle, the guerrilla forces finally defeated the invader.
侵略者的残暴
qīnluèzhěde cánbào
the cruelty of the invaders
侵略者受到了应得的惩罚。
Qīnluèzhě shòudàole yīngdéde chéngfá。
The invaders got the punishment they deserved.
侵略者的末日终于到来了。
Qīnluèzhě de mòrì zhōngyú dàoláile.
The end had finally come for the invaders.
驱除侵略者
qūchú qīnluèzhě
drive away invaders
侵略者的辩护士。
当侵略者的帮凶。
粉碎侵略者的蚕食阴谋
不许侵略者肆意践踏别国的主权。
侵略者胆敢来进犯，就叫他有来无回。
抗击侵略者。
侵略者烧杀掳掠，无恶不作。
蓄须明志，不为侵略者演出。
侵略者陷入战争的泥潭，难以自拔。
申讨侵略者的罪行。
事实粉碎了侵略者不可战胜的神话。
侵略者必然失败。
痛击侵略者。
战争的罪责当然在侵略者那一方面。
憎恨侵略者。
The villagers have to resist the foreign invaders to protect their family and land.
村民们必须反抗外国侵略者以保护家人和土地。
The invader decided to withdraw because of villagers\' five months of stubborn resistance.
侵略者受到村民长达五个月的顽强抵抗，决定撤退。
The village united to fight against invaders.
村民们联合起来反抗侵略者。
The president condemned the violence of the invaders.
总统谴责了侵略者的暴行。
The invaders did their worst.
Qīnlüèzhě fànxiàle suǒ néng fànxià de zuìdà zuìxíng。
侵略者犯下了所能犯下的最大罪行。
The invaders spread their language all over the country.
Qīnlüèzhě zài Quánguó tuīxíng tāmen de yǔyán。
侵略者在全国推行他们的语言。
The disarmament of the aggressor nations must be complete.
Jiěchú qīnlüèzhě guójiā wǔzhuāng de gōngzuò bìxū wánchéng。
解除侵略者国家武装的工作必须完成。
The invaders scorched the land.
Qīnlüèzhě shǐ zhèli chéngwéi jiāotǔ。
侵略者使这里成为焦土。
The invaders encountered stiff opposition.
Qīnlüèzhě yùdàole wánqiáng de dǐkàng。
侵略者遇到了顽强的抵抗。
侵略军强行拆毁民房。
Qīnlüèjūn qiángxíng chāihuǐ mínfáng。
The invading troops tore down the people\'s houses.
侵略军
qīnlüèjūn
aggressor troops; invading army
为了抗击外国的侵略，他们自发组成志愿军。
Wèile kàngjī wàiguó de qīnlüè，tāmen zìfā zǔchéng zhìyuànjūn。
For the purpose of fighting against  the foreign invasion, they organized spontaneously an army composed of volunteers.
US imperialism with its close ally the British government have launched military aggression against Afghanistan.
Měidìguózhǔyì，hé tā de qīnmì méngyǒu Yīngguó duì Āfùhàn fāqǐle jūnshì qīnlüè。
美帝国主义，和他的亲密盟友英国对阿富汗发起了军事侵略。
The country relied on a large navy to defend itself from invasion.
Zhège guójiā yīkào yì zhī pángdà de hǎijūn lái dǐyù qīnlüè。
这个国家依靠一支庞大的海军来抵御侵略。
USS Force was an Aggressive-class minesweeper launched in 1953.
Měiguó jūnjiàn“lìliàng”shì yì zhǒng qīnlüèxìng jí sǎoléijiàn，yú yījiùwǔsì nián tóurù shǐyòng。
美国军舰“力量”是一种侵略性级扫雷舰，于1954年投入使用。
帝国主义侵略者总是向被侵略国施展他们的炮舰外交。
Dìguózhǔyì qīnlüèzhě zǒngshì xiàng bèi qīnlüè guó shīzhǎn tāmen de pàojiàn wàijiāo。
Imperialistic aggressors always use gunboat diplomacy to invade countries.
侵略者到处残害无辜老百姓。
Qīnlüèzhě dàochù cánhài wúgū lǎobǎixìng。
Wherever they went the invaders slaughtered innocent civilians.
侵略军强行拆毁民房。
Qīnlüèjūn qiángxíng chāihuǐ mínfáng。
The invading troops tore down the people\'s houses.
抵御侵略
dǐyù qīnlüè 
resist aggression
反侵略
fǎn qīnlüè
oppose aggression
反抗侵略
fǎnkàng qīnlüè
resist aggression
给侵略者以毁灭性打击
gěi qīnlüèzhě yǐ huǐmièxìngdǎjī 
deal the aggressors a crushing (or devastating) blow
抗击侵略者
kànɡjī qīnlüèzhě
resist the aggressors
历数侵略者的罪行
lìshǔ qīnlüèzhě de zuìxíng
enumerate the crimes of the aggressors
这些士兵没有一个愿意为侵略战争卖命。
Zhèxiē shìbīngméiyǒu yígè yuànyì wèi qīnlüè zhànzhēngmàimìng。
None of these soldiers wanted to die in a war of aggression.
斩断侵略者的魔爪
zhǎnduàn qīnlüèzhě de mózhǎo
cut off the tentacles of the aggressors
士兵们冲出城去，与侵略者拼杀起来。

Shìjiè yúlùn qiǎnzé qīnlüèzhě de tiǎoxìn。
World opinion condemned the aggressor\'s provocation.
侵略别国
qīnlüè bié guó
commit aggression against another country
侵略国
qīnlüèɡuó
aggressor (nation)

qīnlüèjūn
aggressor troops; invading army
侵略行为
qīnlüè xíngwéi

qīnlüè zhànzhēnɡ

aggressor; invader

wénhuà qīnlüè 
cultural aggression; cultural penetration

侵略
qīnlüè
aggression; invasion
这份笔供揭露了侵略者的暴行。
Zhè fèn bǐgòng jiēlòu le qīnlüèzhě de bàoxíng。

The intruders\' tyrannical behavior led the local people to revolt.
发动侵略战争的人，简直就是危害世界和平的反动派。
Fādòng qīnlüè zhànzhēng de rén，jiǎnzhí jiùshì wēihài shìjiè hépíng de fǎndòngpài。
Those who started the war of aggression are reactionaries who put the peace of the world in danger.
那些侵略者就像匪盗，疯狂地掠夺别人的财产。
Nàxiē qīnlüèzhě jiù xiàng fěidào，fēngkuáng de lüěduó biérén de cáichǎn。
The invaders were like robbers and thieves who plundered other people\'s possessions.
中国任人宰割，任人侵略的日子一去不复返了。
Zhōngguó rènrén zǎigē，rènrén qīnlüè de rìzi yíqù bú fùfǎn le。
The days when the Chinese were invaded and exploited have gone.
徐彭是中国人民抗击日本侵略的风雨晦冥时的杰出人物。
Xú Péng shì Zhōngguó rénmín kàngjī Rìběn qīnlüè de fēngyǔ huìmíng shí de jiéchū rénwù。
Xu Peng was an outstanding hero during the difficult time when the Chinese people were fighting against the Japanese invasion.
那些侵略者坑杀无辜百姓的罪行，我们绝不能忘记。
Nàxiē qīnlüèzhě kēngshā wúgū bǎixìng de zuìxíng，wǒmen jué bùnéng wàngjì。
We\'ll never forget that those invaders murdered people by burying them alive.

Invaders encountered dogged defense by local armies organized by landlords all over the country.

The invaders are attacked by local military groups.

反抗侵略的义举|
憎恨侵略者。
This country has an aggressive foreign policy.
这个国家采用的是一种侵略性的外交策略。
It is an imperative that we help defend friendly nations.
我们有义务帮助友国抵制侵略。
The villagers have to resist the foreign invaders to protect their family and land.
村民们必须反抗外国侵略者以保护家人和土地。
The invader decided to withdraw because of villagers\' five months of stubborn resistance.
侵略者受到村民长达五个月的顽强抵抗，决定撤退。
Some aggressive nations threaten world peace.
一些侵略成性的国家威胁着世界和平。
The village united to fight against invaders.
村民们联合起来反抗侵略者。
Poison pills is one strategy used to defend against hostile takeovers.
使用毒药是一种抵御侵略的策略。
After invading Poland, their next target was Denmark.
他们侵略波兰后的下一个攻击目标是丹麦。
The president condemned the violence of the invaders.
总统谴责了侵略者的暴行。
USS Force was an Aggressive-class minesweeper launched in 1953.

这个国家依靠一支庞大的海军来抵御侵略。
US imperialism with its close ally the British government have launched military aggression against Afghanistan.
Měidìguózhǔyì，hé tā de qīnmì méngyǒu Yīngguó duì Āfùhàn fāqǐle jūnshì qīnlüè。
美帝国主义，和他的亲密盟友英国对阿富汗发起了军事侵略。
