rénshēn bùkě qīnfàn
inviolability of the person
由于水的不断侵蚀，日久天长就形成了一个大溶洞。
Yóuyú shuǐ de búduàn qīnshí，rìjiǔtiāncháng jiù xíngchéng le yígè dà róngdòng。
As a result of continuous water erosion, in the course of time a huge cave was formed.
侵犯别国主权是绝不容许的。
Qīnfàn bié guó zhǔquán shì jué bùróngxǔ de。
It is absolutely impermissible to encroach upon the sovereignty of a country.
消灭一切敢于入侵的敌人
xiāomiè yíqiè gǎnyú rùqīn de dírén
wipe out all enemies who dare to invade our country
这等于是给侵略者输血打气。
Zhè děngyú shì gěi qīnlüèzhě shūxuè dǎqì。
This is tantamount to giving the aggressor a shot in the arm.
文化侵略
wénhuà qīnlüè 
cultural aggression; cultural penetration
侵略行径
qīnlüè xíngjìng
act of aggression
石灰岩经地下水长时期的侵蚀，形成岩洞。
Shíhuīyán jīngdìxiàshuǐ chángshíqī de qīnshí，xíngchéngyándòng。
Caves are formed by the erosion of limestone by groundwater over many thousands of years.
严惩入侵之敌
yánchénɡ rùqīn zhī dí
deal the invaders a crushing blow
侵略野心
qīnlüè yěxīn
aggressive ambitions
游击队长期在山区和侵略者周旋。
Yóujīduì chángqī zài shānqū hé qīnlüèzhě zhōuxuán。
For a long time, the guerrillas fought the invaders in hilly country.
助长侵略者的野心
zhùzhǎngqīnlüèzhě de yěxīn 
whet the ambitions of the aggressors
侵略
qīnlüè
aggression; invasion
入侵
rùqīn
invade; intrude; make an incursion; make inroads
侵晨
qīnchén
approaching daybreak; towards dawn
这份笔供揭露了侵略者的暴行。
Zhè fèn bǐgòng jiēlòu le qīnlüèzhě de bàoxíng。
His written confession discloses the ferocity of the invaders.
这个部族对于比自己强大的侵略者毫不屈服，顽强战斗。
Zhège bùzú duìyú bǐ zìjǐ qiángdà de qīnlüèzhě háobùqūfú，wánqiáng zhàndòu。
This tribe refused to yield to the powerful invaders, and fought bravely.
侵略者的残虐的行径，激起了当地民众的反抗。
Qīnlüèzhě de cánnüè de xíngjìng，jīqǐ le dāngdì mínzhòng de fǎnkàng。
The intruders\' tyrannical behavior led the local people to revolt.
发动侵略战争的人，简直就是危害世界和平的反动派。
Fādòng qīnlüè zhànzhēng de rén，jiǎnzhí jiùshì wēihài shìjiè hépíng de fǎndòngpài。
Those who started the war of aggression are reactionaries who put the peace of the world in danger.
那些侵略者就像匪盗，疯狂地掠夺别人的财产。
Nàxiē qīnlüèzhě jiù xiàng fěidào，fēngkuáng de lüěduó biérén de cáichǎn。
The invaders were like robbers and thieves who plundered other people\'s possessions.
中国任人宰割，任人侵略的日子一去不复返了。
Zhōngguó rènrén zǎigē，rènrén qīnlüè de rìzi yíqù bú fùfǎn le。
The days when the Chinese were invaded and exploited have gone.
海侵是由于全球变暖，冰山融水增加而引发的。
Hǎiqīn shì yóuyú quánqiú biànnuǎn，bīngshān róngshuǐ zēngjiā ér yǐnfā de。
Global warming melts the ice in the polar regions, and the increasing water is the cause of transgression.
为了防止害兽对家畜的侵袭，村民们自发的组成了巡逻队在夜里巡逻防范。
Wèile fángzhǐ hàishòu duì jiāchù de qīnxí，cūnmínmen zìfā de zǔchéng le xúnluóduì zài yèlǐ xúnluó fángfàn。
To prevent livestock from harmful animals\' attack, the villagers spontaneously form night patrols.
徐彭是中国人民抗击日本侵略的风雨晦冥时的杰出人物。
Xú Péng shì Zhōngguó rénmín kàngjī Rìběn qīnlüè de fēngyǔ huìmíng shí de jiéchū rénwù。
Xu Peng was an outstanding hero during the difficult time when the Chinese people were fighting against the Japanese invasion.
我们要及时坚壁以防敌人侵入。
Wǒmen yào jíshí jiānbì yǐ fáng dírén qīnrù。
We should enhance our defenses to keep off the invading enemy.
那些侵略者坑杀无辜百姓的罪行，我们绝不能忘记。
Nàxiē qīnlüèzhě kēngshā wúgū bǎixìng de zuìxíng，wǒmen jué bùnéng wàngjì。
We\'ll never forget that those invaders murdered people by burying them alive.
侵略者掳夺走了很多的文物珍品。
Qīnlüèzhě lǔduó zǒu le hěnduō de wénwù zhēnpǐn。
The invaders pillaged many cultural relics and treasures.
那些说我坏话的人是在侵害我的名誉权！
Nàxiē shuō wǒ huàihuà de rén shì zài qīnhài wǒ de míngyùquán！
Those speaking evil of me infringe on my right of reputation.
他剽取了我的专利知识，侵犯了我的产权，我要起诉他！
Tā piāoqǔ le wǒ de zhuānlì zhīshi，qīnfàn le wǒ de chǎnquán，wǒ yào qǐsù tā！
He stole my patent, encroaching on my property rights, so I am going to sue him.
她因侵夺别人财产而成了被告。
Tā yīn qīnduó biérén cáichǎn ér chéng le bèigào。
She stands accused of encroaching on others\' possessions.
伪劣商品侵越了消费者的合法权益。
Wěiliè shāngpǐn qīnyuè le xiāofèizhě de héfǎ quányì。
Counterfeit goods infringe customers\' legal rights.
侵略者的暴行引发了人民战争的高潮。
Qīnlüèzhě de bàoxíng yǐnfā le rénmín zhànzhēng de gāocháo。
The aggressors\' atrocities aroused a surge in the people\'s war.
当我们的利益受到侵害的时候，要懂得寻求司法援助。
Dāng wǒmen de lìyì shòudào qīnhài de shíhou，yào dǒngdé xúnqiú sīfǎ yuánzhù。
When our rights are obstructed, we should know to seek for judicial help.
这一带种植大面积松墙是为了防止沙尘暴的侵袭。
Zhè yídài zhòngzhí dà miànjī sōngqiáng shì wèi le fángzhǐ shāchénbào de qīnxí。
The purpose of planting such a huge pine wall is to prevent sandstorms.
侵略者遭到了各地团练的顽强抵抗。
Qīnlüèzhě zāodào le gè dì tuánliàn de wánqiáng dǐkàng。
Invaders encountered dogged defense by local armies organized by landlords all over the country.
这个弱小的国家最终打败了外军的入侵。
Zhège ruòxiǎo de guójiā zuì zhōng dǎbài le wàijūn de rùqīn。
This small country successfully defended against the invasion of foreign troops in the end.
侵略者遭到了当地乡勇的攻击。
Qīnlüèzhě zāodào le dàngdì xiāngyǒng de gōngjī。
The invaders are attacked by local military groups.
对异性进行性侵犯会受到法律制裁。
Duì yìxìng jìnxíng xìng qīnfàn huì shòudào fǎlǜ zhìcái。
Those who sexually harrass the opposite sex will be punished by the law.
侵略者来势汹汹，我们要尽快想好应敌之策。
Qīnlüèzhě láishì xiōngxiōng，wǒmen yào jǐnkuài xiǎnghǎo yìngdí zhī cè。
The invaders attacked in full fury, and we must think out a strategy to deal with them.
如果侵略者再犯，我们会誓死抵抗！
Rúguǒ qīnlüèzhě zàifàn，wǒmen huì shìsǐ dǐkàng！
If the invaders dare to come once again, we swear to fight against them until the last minute.
为了抗击外国的侵略，他们自发组成志愿军。
Wèile kàngjī wàiguó de qīnlüè，tāmen zìfā zǔchéng zhìyuànjūn。
For the purpose of fighting against  the foreign invasion, they organized spontaneously an army composed of volunteers.
它们保护着自己的领地，以防其他种群入侵。
Tāmen bǎohù zhe zìjǐ de lǐngdì，yǐfáng qítā zhǒng qún rùqīn。
They protect their own territory, preventing the invasion of other species groups.
主权国的领土不容别国势力侵犯。
Zhǔquánguó de lǐngtǔ bùróng biéguó shìlì qīnfàn。
A sovereign state would never allow other countries to violate its own territory.
入侵别国搞分裂的人最终会自取灭亡。
Rùqīn biéguó gǎo fēnliè de rén zuì zhōng huì zìqǔ mièwáng。
Those who invaded other countries would finally die of the trouble they brought about.
你侵犯(了)我的姓名权，我和你没完。
Nǐ qīnfàn( le )wǒ de xìngmíngquán，wǒ hé nǐ méiwán。
领事裁判权的存在，是对国家属地优越权的例外或侵犯。
Lǐngshì cáipànquán de cúnzài，shì duì guójiā shǔdì yōuyuèquán de lìwài huò qīnfàn。
Consular jurisdiction is an exception or infringement of a country’s superior right of territory.
游击队经过几年的斗争终于打败了侵略者。
Yóujīduì jīngguò jǐnián de dòuzhēng zhōng yú dǎbài le qīnlüèzhě。
After several years of struggle, the guerrilla forces finally defeated the invader.
被侵犯的国家发出了最后通牒，要求占领部队撤出该地区。
Bèiqīnfàn de guójiā fāchū le zuìhòu tōngdié，yāoqiú zhànlǐng bùduì chèchū gāidìqū。
The offended country sent out its ultimatum, demanding the occupying troops withdraw from that region.
这种农药可以有效地预防棉铃虫的侵害。
Zhèzhǒng nóngyào kěyǐ yǒuxiào de yùfáng Miánlíngchóng de qīnhài。
This pesticide can effectively prevent bollworms.
侵略者的残暴
qīnluèzhěde cánbào
the cruelty of the invaders

Qīnluèzhě shòudàole yīngdéde chéngfá。
The invaders got the punishment they deserved.

constructive fraud
【法律】推定欺诈(指虽无恶意动机，但侵害他人或公共利益，在法律上应以欺诈论处的行为) (指虽无恶意动机，但侵害他人或公共利益，在法律上应以欺诈论处的行为)
Phage uses the bacterium\'s machinery and energy to produce more phage until the bacterium is destroyed and phage is released to invade surrounding bacteria.

在听得到招呼的距离内；在近处[原系航海用语]

我的房子比简的房子距离公司近。

Nà shì tā jùlí sǐwáng zuì jìn de yí cì。

a stone\'s throw
投石可及的距离；一箭之地；近在咫尺
The museum is quite close to the port.
博物馆距离港口相当近。
A cat stalks a duck until it gets within striking distance.

他们距离风暴的凤眼很近。

爱丁堡距离格拉斯哥有多近？

距离截止日期只有一天了，所以你需要有效地利用时间。
行距
hángjù
row spacing

商店有很多鞋子可供选择。
The large shoes were very loose.
Dà xiézǐ fēicháng kuānsōng。
大鞋子非常宽松。
His shoes were crunching on the gravel.
Tā de xiézǐ cǎi zài shālì shàng shāshā de xiǎng。
他的鞋子踩在沙粒上沙沙地响。
He wears a size 13 shoe.
Tā chuān 13 hào de xiézi。
他穿13号的鞋子。
This style of shoe is in demand.

这种式样的鞋子销路很好。

Tā diūle yì zhī xiézi。
他丢了一只鞋子。

He gave his shoes a good cleaning.

他把鞋子很好地清洁了一遍。
He cleaned his shoes compulsively after every walk.
Měi cì bùxíng zhīhòu tā dōuhuì jìnbúzhù cā gānjìng zìjǐ de xiézǐ。
每次步行之后他都会禁不住擦干净自己的鞋子。
He emptied out a shoeful of water.
Tā dào chūle xiézǐ lǐ de shuǐ。
他倒出了鞋子里的水。

Tā de jiǎo qiǎomiào de shēn xiàng le qiánduān jiān xì de xiézǐ lǐ。

Her shoes had acutely pointed toes.
Tā de xiézǐ qiánduān fēicháng jiānr。
她的鞋子前端非常尖儿。

Wǒ de xiédǐ kāijiāo le。
The sole of my shoe came unglued.
鞋后跟开绽了。
Xiéhòugēn kāizhàn le。
The shoe has split at the heel.
鞋底磨了个窟窿
xiédǐ mó le gè kūlong
have worn a hole in the sole of one\'s shoe
坤鞋
kūnxié
woman\'s shoes
他从床底下摸出一双鞋来。
Tā cóngchuángdǐxià mōchū yì shuāngxié lái。
He fished out a pair of shoes from under the bed.

mú yà jiāo dǐ píxié

纳鞋底子
nà xiédǐzi

鞋襻儿
xiépànr
shoe strap
平底鞋
píngdǐxié

鞋底破了个口儿
xiédǐ pò le gè kǒur
got a hole in the sole of one\'s shoe
您穿的尺码的鞋我们恰好有。
Nín chuān de chǐmǎ de xié wǒmen qiàhǎo yǒu。
We have just the size of shoes you wear.
鞋舌
xiéshé
the tongue of a shoe
收拾鞋子
shōushi xiézi

一双鞋
yì shuāng xié
a pair of shoes
你的鞋带松了。
Nǐ de xiédài sōng le。
Your shoelace has come loose.
别趿拉着鞋走路。
Bié tālazhe xié zǒulù。
Don\'t walk around with the backs of your shoes turned in. or Don\'t use your shoes as slippers.
这双鞋不透水。
Zhèshuāngxié bú tòushuǐ。
These shoes are waterproof.
他鞋上都是土。
Tā xié shàngdōushì tǔ。
There\'s dust all over his shoes.
这鞋如果不合适，商店管退钱。
Zhè xié rúguǒ bùhéshì，shāngdiàn guǎn tuìqián。
If the shoes do not wear well, the shop will refund your money.
脱鞋(衣服)
tuō xié（yīfu）
take off one\'s shoes (clothes)

xiǎohàoxié

楦鞋
xuàn xié

yán xiékǒu

Zhèshuāngxié wǒ háiyào ne。
I want to keep these shoes.
靠修鞋营生
kào xiū xié yíngshēng
earn a living as a cobbler
我这双凉鞋今年夏天还可以应付过去。
Wǒ zhè shuāngliángxié jīnnián xiàtiān hái kěyǐ yìngfù guòqù。
I\'ll make do with these sandals for this summer.
他打草鞋很在行。
Tā dǎ cǎoxié hěn zàiháng。

gěi mǒurén chuān xiǎoxié

Wǒ xiǎng gěi wǒ zhè xié dǎ gè niúpí bāotóur，nín kàn xíng ma？

He is very unpopular because he always makes things difficult for his colleagues.
他穿着旱冰鞋，嗤溜一下滑向前方。
Tā chuān zhe hànbīngxié，chīliū yíxià huá xiàng qiánfāng。
He roller-skated forward with a sliding sound.
出号的鞋子真是不好买，转了好多店也没找到。

他边说话边用针刺戳着鞋底。
Tā biān shuōhuà biān yòng zhēn cìchuō zhe xiédǐ。

我正在给皮鞋打油。
Wǒ zhèngzài gěi píxié dǎyóu。

她新买的翻毛皮鞋看上去非常时尚。

Her newly bought suede shoes look very fashionable.
她穿着高跟鞋嘎噔嘎噔地下楼来了。

New shoes always don\'t fit perfectly.
她新买的皮鞋是尖头的，款式很新颖。

She bought a new type of leather shoes with pointed ends.

这双运动鞋脚感很好，买得真值。

The sports shoes are worth buying as they are comfortable to wear.
这双解放鞋是我哥哥当兵的时候穿的。

This pair of canvas shoes was worn by my brother when he was in the army.

wearing high-heeled shoes

Zhè wèi lǎorén búdàn méiyǒu shīqù dàngnián de yīngjùn，érqiě méiyǒu shīqù wǎngnián de huólì。
这位老人不但没有失去当年的英俊，而且没有失去往年的活力。
When the cute man was looked at her, her heart gave a nervous flutter.
Dāng nàgè yīngjùn de nánrén dīngzhe tā kàn shí，tā de xīnzàng kāishǐ pēngpēng luàntiào。
当那个英俊的男人盯着她看时，她的心脏开始怦怦乱跳。
This is the most handsome man I ever clapped my eyes on.
Zhè shì wǒ jiànguò de zuì yīngjùn de nánrén le。
这是我见过的最英俊的男人了。
She was deep in conversation with a handsome young advocate.
Tā yǔ yí wèi niánqīng yīngjùn de yōnghùzhě jìnxíng shēnrù jiāotán。
她与一位年轻英俊的拥护者进行深入交谈。
Men feared him and women lusted after the handsome warrior.
Nánrénmen hàipà tā，nǚrénmen fēnfēn zhuīqiú zhège yīngjùn de yǒngshì。
男人们害怕他，女人们纷纷追求这个英俊的勇士。
The young lady has set her cap at the handsome young prince.
Zhège shàonǚ jílì tiǎodòu niánqīng yīngjùn de wángzǐ。
这个少女极力挑逗年轻英俊的王子。
The father is portrayed as a good-looking man in this painting.
Zài zhè fú huà zhōng，fùqīn bèi huà de hěn yīngjùn。
在这幅画中，父亲被画得很英俊。
The cream of England\'s young men were killed in the great war.
Yīnggélán de qīngnián cáijùn zài yí zhàn zhōng bèi shāguāng le。
英格兰的青年才俊在一战中被杀光了。
His striking good looks always created a sensation.
Tā yīngjùn de róngmào zǒngshì yǐnqǐ hōngdòng。
他英俊的容貌总是引起轰动。
a handsome man with a clipped moustache
Yí gè húzǐ xiūjiǎn zhěngqí de yīngjùn nánrén
一个胡子修剪整齐的英俊男人
He was dashingly handsome.
Tā yīngjùn shízú。
他英俊十足。
A lanky kid transformed almost overnight into a handsome young man.
Zhège shòucháng nánkàn de háizi jīhū zài yíyèzhījiān jiù biànchéngle yí gè yīngjùn de shàonián。
这个瘦长难看的孩子几乎在一夜之间就变成了一个英俊的少年。
An attractive man will be a pleasure to look at.
yígè yīngjùn nánzǐ huì ràng rén shǎngxīnyuèmù。
一个英俊男子会让人赏心悦目。
这面土墙是夯土版筑而成。
Zhè miàn tǔqiáng shì hāngtǔ bǎnzhù ér chéng。
The wall was built by stamping earth between board frames.
夯土筑墙。
天安门是北京的城标性建筑。
Tiān\'ānmén shì Běijīng de chéngbiāoxìng jiànzhù。
Tiananmen Square is the symbol of Beijing.
这座电视塔是本城最高的建筑。
Zhèzuò diànshìtǎ shì běnchéng zuìgāo de jiànzhù。
The television tower is the tallest construction in this town.
我国古代的伟大建筑，恐怕莫过于万里长城了。
Wǒguó gǔdài de wěidà jiànzhù，kǒngpà mò guò yú Wàn Lǐ Chángchéng le。
Of all the ancient Chinese buildings, the Great Wall is perhaps the greatest.
这个城市正在大兴土木，建筑项目满天飞。
Zhège chéngshì zhèngzài dàxīng tǔmù，jiànzhù xiàng mù mǎntiānfēi。
Large-scale constructions are being launched in the city. Construction projects can be seen everywhere.
由于建筑规划和空气污染等因素，城市的热岛效应越来越严重了。
Yóuyú jiànzhù guīhuà hé kōngqì wūrǎn děng yīnsù，chéngshì de rèdǎo xiàoyìng yuèláiyuè yánzhòng le。
Because of factors such as construction layout and air pollution, the city\'s heat island effect is getting more and more severe.
长城是世界最伟大的建筑奇迹之一。
Chángchéng shì shìjiè zuì wěidà de jiànzhù qíjì zhīyī。
The Great Wall is one of the greatest wonders of the world.
北京城的四合院是中国传统建筑中的杰出典型。
Běijīng Chéng de sìhéyuàn shì Zhōngguó chuántǒng jiànzhù zhōng de jiéchū diǎnxíng。
The compound with houses around a courtyard in Beijing is a typical example of Chinese traditional architecture.
故宫的三大殿都建筑在北京城的中轴线上。
把我们的血肉筑成我们新的长城
紫禁城是我国现存的最大最完整的古代宫殿建筑群。
Freeways are wide roads built above city streets.
城市快速路就是建筑在城市街道上面的宽阔马路。
The buildings are all substantial even on the outskirts of city.
Zhèxiē jiànzhù shènzhì zài chéngshì jiāoqū dōushì hěn jiāngù de。
这些建筑甚至在城市郊区都是很坚固的。
Acid rain corroded the architecture of the city.
酸雨侵蚀了这个城市的建筑。
A few of the buildings in town dates from the early 19th century.
Chénglǐ yìxiē jiànzhù de lìshǐ kěyǐ zhuīsùdào 19 shìjì zǎoqī。
城里一些建筑的历史可以追溯到19世纪早期。
The city authorized a housing project．
这座城市的一项住房建筑规划被批准了。
There are many buildings after Roman style in this city.
这座城市有很多仿罗马风格的建筑。
With its wide streets and colorfully painted houses, the city combines Spanish and Caribbean traditions.
这座城市融合了西班牙和加勒比海的建筑传统，有着宽阔的街道和色彩缤纷的房子。
A walk through town will unfold many interesting buildings.
Zài chéng lǐmiàn zǒuzǒu nénggòu fāxiàn hěn duō yǒu yìsi de jiànzhùwù。
在城里面走走能够发现很多有意思的建筑物。
我们一般把高度超过100米的建筑称为超高建筑。
Wǒmen yìbān bǎ gāodù chāoguò yìbǎimǐ de jiànzhù chēngwéi chāogāo jiànzhù。
Buildings over 100 meters tall are called sky scrapers.
这一带的建筑群大都是北欧的建筑风格。
Zhè yídài de jiànzhùqún dàdōushì běiōu de jiànzhù fēnggé。
The architectural complex of this area is of the style of northern Europe.
搞建筑是他的本行。
Gǎo jiànzhù shì tā de běnháng。
Architecture is his line of work.
天坛的建筑结构非常别致。
Tiāntán de jiànzhù jiégòu fēicháng biézhì。
The architecture of the Temple of Heaven is unique.
采购建筑材料
cǎigòu jiànzhù cáiliào 
purchase building materials
筑路工人长年奋战在风雪高原。
Zhùlù gōngrén chángnián fènzhàn zài fēngxuě gāoyuán。
The road builders brave the wind and snow on the plateaus all the year round.
宾馆由建筑公司承建。
Bīnguǎn yóu jiànzhù gōngsī chéngjiàn。 
A construction company has been contracted to build the guesthouse.
筑路大军
zhùlù dàjūn 
a large contingent of road builders
大火之后，庙里过去那些雄伟建筑荡然无存。
Dàhuǒ zhīhòu，miào lǐ guòqù nàxiē xióngwěi jiànzhù dàngránwúcún。
Nothing remained of the beautiful temple buildings after the fire.
工地上建筑材料堆积如山。
Gōngdì shàng jiànzhù cáiliào duījīrúshān。
Building materials are piled up mountain-high on the construction site.
富丽堂皇的建筑
fùlìtánghuáng de jiànzhù
magnificent buildings
高大的建筑物
gāodà de jiànzhùwù
tall buildings
修筑工事
xiūzhù gōngshì
build fortifications (or defence works)
公共建筑
gōnggòng jiànzhù
public buildings
宫殿式建筑
gōngdiànshì jiànzhù
palatial architecture
构筑工事
ɡòuzhù ɡōnɡshì
construct field works (or fortifications); build defences; dig in
很多古代建筑遭到毁损。
Hěnduō ɡǔdài jiànzhù zāodào huǐsǔn。 
Many ancient buildings have been damaged.
建筑铁路
jiànzhù tiělù 
build a railway
你不能把自己的幸福建筑在别人的痛苦上。
Nǐ bùnéng bǎ zìjǐ de xìngfú jiànzhù zài biérén de tòngkǔ shàng。
You shouldn\'t build your happiness on the suffering of other people.
古老的建筑
gǔlǎo de jiànzhù 
an ancient building
宏伟的建筑
hóngwěi de jiànzhù 
a magnificent structure
他是学现代建筑的。
Tā shì xué xiàndài jiànzhù de。
His speciality is modern architecture.
建筑设计
jiànzhù shèjì 
architectural design
这些建筑禁受了时间的考验。
Zhèxiē jiànzhù jīnshòu le shíjiān de kǎoyàn。
These buildings have stood the test of time.
这样宏伟的建筑，竟然只用十个月的时间就完成了。
Zhèyànghóngwěi de jiànzhù，jìngrán zhǐ yòngshí gè yuè de shíjiān jiù wánchéng le。
To think that such a magnificent building was completed in ten months!
北京许多古建筑已经修缮一新，恢复了旧观。
Běijīngxǔduō gǔjiànzhù yǐjing xiūshànyìxīn，huīfù le jiùguān。
Many old buildings in Beijing have been renovated and restored to their former glory (or splendour).
这批建筑材料由三个单位均分。
Zhè pī jiànzhù cáiliào yóu sāngè dānwèi jūnfēn。
This lot of building materials will be shared out equally among three units.
上层建筑领域
shàngcéngjiànzhù lǐngyù 
the realm of the superstructure
我国古代的伟大建筑，恐怕莫过于万里长城了。
Wǒguó gǔdài de wěidà jiànzhù，kǒngpà mò guò yú Wàn Lǐ Chángchéng le。
Of all the ancient Chinese buildings, the Great Wall is perhaps the greatest.
劈山筑路
pī shān zhù lù
blast cliffs to build highways or railways
在齐腰深的水里筑坝
zài qí yāo shēn de shuǐ lǐ zhùbà
stand waist-deep in water building the dam
古建筑群落
gǔjiànzhù qúnluò
group of ancient buildings
筑人墙
zhù rénqiáng
set a wall
文化艺术属于上层建筑。
Wénhuà yìshù shǔyú shàngcéngjiànzhù。
Culture and art belong to the realm of the superstructure.
建筑声学
jiànzhù shēngxué
architectural acoustics
建筑物的图纸
jiànzhùwù de túzhǐ 
drawing of a building
筑圩
zhùwéi 
build dykes
燕子衔泥筑窠。
Yànzi xián ní zhù kē。
Swallows carry bits of earth in their bills to build nests.
修复有历史意义的建筑物
xiūfù yǒu lìshǐ yìyì de jiànzhùwù
renovate historic buildings
修筑桥梁
xiūzhù qiáoliánɡ
build bridges
修筑堤坝
xiūzhù dībà
put up dykes
建筑工程学院
jiànzhù ɡōnɡchénɡ xuéyuàn
institute of civil engineering
正在建筑的电视发射台日见增高。
Zhèngzài jiànzhù de diànshì fāshètái rìjiàn zēnggāo。
The TV tower under construction is getting higher each day.
他原是学建筑的，中途改行搞地质了。
Tā yuán shì xué jiànzhù de，zhōng tú gǎihánggǎo dìzhì le。
At first he studied architecture, but later he switched to geology.
筑路
zhù lù 
construct a road
筑堤
zhù dī 
build a dyke
筑巢引凤
zhù cháo yǐn fènɡ 
build nest to attract phoenix—build infrastructure to attract investment domestic and foreign
这项工程已转包给一家建筑公司。
Zhè xiàng gōngchéngyǐ zhuǎnbāo gěi yìjiā jiànzhù gōngsī。
The project has been subcontracted to a construction company.
建筑队在指定地点安营扎寨。
Jiànzhùduì zài zhǐdìng dìdiǎn ānyíng zāzhài。
The construction crew set camp at the specified place.
我国发明版筑技术的地区应该是黄河流域。
Wǒ guó fāmíng bǎnzhù jìshù de dìqū yīnggāi shì Huáng Hé liúyù。
The place where typography was probably invented in our country was the Huanghe river region.
这面土墙是夯土版筑而成。
Zhè miàn tǔqiáng shì hāngtǔ bǎnzhù ér chéng。
The wall was built by stamping earth between board frames.
在这张建筑图纸上，我却没找到标图。
Zài zhèzhāng jiànzhù túzhǐ shàng，wǒ què méi zhǎodào biāotú。
I didn’t find the scale in this architectural drawing.
这家建筑公司新添了10台铲运车。
Zhèjiā jiànzhù gōngsī xīntiān le shítái chǎnyùnchē。
This company has just purchased ten new forklifts.
他经常抄拿公司里的建筑材料。
Tā jīngcháng chāoná gōngsī lǐ de jiànzhù cáiliào。
He often takes building materials in the company for private use.
我公司承订各种建筑材料。
Wǒ gōngsī chéngdìng gèzhǒng jiànzhù cáiliào。
Our company accepts orders of all kinds of construction materials.
天安门是北京的城标性建筑。
Tiān\'ānmén shì Běijīng de chéngbiāoxìng jiànzhù。
Tiananmen Square is the symbol of Beijing.
这些土筑堤埝根本起不到防洪作用。
Zhèxiē tǔzhù dīniàn gēnběn qǐbúdào fánghóng zuòyòng。
These earth dykes can\'t hold against floods.
这些古老的建筑大部分有“滴水”这个装置。
Zhèxiē gǔlǎo de jiànzhù dàbùfen yǒu“dīshuǐ”zhège zhuāngzhì。
Most of these old buildings are equipped with dripstones.
这个跌水是使用混凝土浇筑成的，相当牢固。
Zhège diēshuǐ shì shǐyòng hùnníngtǔ jiāozhù chéng de，xiāngdāng láogù。
This ladder in the canal is made of concrete and is very secure.
中国的古代建筑大部分都有一个很大的顶子。
Zhōngguó de gǔdài jiànzhù dàbùfen dōu yǒu yígè hěndà de dǐngzi。
Most buildings in ancient China had a huge roof.
这座四合院的建筑格局很符合法式。
Zhèzuò sìhéyuàn de jiànzhù géjú hěn fúhé fǎshì。
This building is a typical siheyuan.
仿生建筑已经成为一种新的潮流。
Fǎngshēng jiànzhù yǐjing chéngwéi yìzhǒng xīn de cháoliú。
Bionic architecture has become a new trend.
这个古老建筑的风火墙早已无法承担防火的重任了。
Zhè ge gǔlǎo jiànzhù de fēnghuǒqiáng zǎoyǐ wúfǎ chéngdān fánghuǒ de zhòngrèn le。
This ancient fire wall can no longer take the full burden of fire-proofing.
在建筑工地的旁边新盖了一栋工房。
Zài jiànzhù gōngdì de pángbiān xīngài le yí dòng gōngfáng。
A new work shed has been set up near the construction site.
这家建材供应站销售各种建筑材料。
Zhèjiā jiàncái gōngyīngzhàn xiāoshòu gèzhǒng jiànzhù cáiliào。
This supply station for building materials sells all kinds of building materials.
这座建筑的规制很别致，看起来意趣盎然。
Zhèzuò jiànzhù de guīzhì hěnbiézhì，kànqǐlái yìqù àngrán。
The scale and structure of this building is unique and very interesting.
这个建筑，耗用了不少人力物力。
Zhège jiànzhù，hàoyòng le bùshǎo rénlì wùlì。
This architecture consumes a lot of manpower, and material resources.
这张建筑图纸满是红线，我实在看不懂。
Zhèzhāng jiànzhù túzhǐ mǎnshì hóngxiàn，wǒ shízai kàn bùdǒng。
The construction blueprint is full of borderlines. I am really blind to them.
建筑工人正在新工地搭建简易房。
Jiànzhù gōngrén zhèngzài xīn gōngdì dājiàn jiǎnyìfáng。
The construction workers are building temporary houses on the construction site.
建筑师在给工人讲解图纸。
Jiànzhùshī zài gěi gōngrén jiǎngjiě túzhǐ。
The architect is explaining the blueprint to workers.
从事建筑业的工人收入微薄。
Cóngshì jiànzhùyè de gōngrén shōurù wēibó。
Ordinary workers in the building industry earn meager salaries.
为了做好江防工作，政府投入大量资金修筑长江两岸防护堤坝。
Wèile zuòhǎo jiāngfáng gōngzuò，zhèngfǔ tóurù dàliàng zījīn xiūzhù Cháng Jiāng liǎng\'ànfáng hùdībà。
In order to prevent floods, the government has allocated a lot of money for defensive projects against flooding along the Yangtze River.
这座楼的混凝土浇筑工作已完成。
Zhèzuò lóu de hùnníngtǔ jiāozhù gōngzuò yǐ wánchéng。
The pouring of concrete for this building is finished.
苦土石灰是一种不错的建筑用石灰。
Kǔtǔ shíhuī shì yìzhǒng búcuò de jiànzhùyòng shíhuī。
Magnesia lime is an ideal lime for construction.
用来拦洪筑坝的物资已经运到了。
Yònglái lánhóng zhùbà de wùzī yǐjing yùndào le。
Goods and materials used to build dams and hold back floodwater have arrived.
上海的国际礼拜堂是一座近代哥特式的砖木结构的建筑。
Shànghǎi de guójì lǐbàitáng shì yízuò jìndài gētèshì de zhuānmù jiégòu de jiànzhù。
The Shanghai International Church is a modern Gothic building made of wood and bricks.
鲁班是建筑工匠的祖师。
Lǔ Bān shì jiànzhù gōngjiàng de zǔshī。
Lu Ban was the originator of architecture.
我买了一本《建筑文化论丛》，内容不错。
Wǒ mǎi le yì běn《Jiànzhù wénhuà lùncóng》，nèiróng búcuò。
I bought the Anthology on the Culture of Architecture, which is rich in content.
这个城市正在大兴土木，建筑项目满天飞。
Zhège chéngshì zhèngzài dàxīng tǔmù，jiànzhù xiàng mù mǎntiānfēi。
Large-scale constructions are being launched in the city. Construction projects can be seen everywhere.
这个门市部主要经营各种建筑材料。
Zhège ménshìbùzhǔyào jīngyíng gèzhǒng jiànzhù cáiliào。
This retail department specializes in selling all kinds of architecture materials.
社区里发布了限期迫迁违章建筑的通知。
Shèqū lǐ fābù le xiànqī pòqiān wéizhāng jiànzhù de tōngzhī。
The community sent out a notice of compulsory evacuation of the substandard building before the deadline.
这座古建筑是用青砖砌成的。
Zhèzuò gǔjiànzhù shì yòng qīngzhuān qìchéng de。
The ancient construction was built with grey bricks.
由于建筑规划和空气污染等因素，城市的热岛效应越来越严重了。
Yóuyú jiànzhù guīhuà hé kōngqì wūrǎn děng yīnsù，chéngshì de rèdǎo xiàoyìng yuèláiyuè yánzhòng le。
Because of factors such as construction layout and air pollution, the city\'s heat island effect is getting more and more severe.
建筑工人无意中从地下挖出一具尸蜡。
Jiànzhù gōngrén wúyì zhōng cóng dìxia wāchū yíjù shīlà。
The construction workers accidentally dug out a dried and preserved dead body from underground.
北京城的四合院是中国传统建筑中的杰出典型。
Běijīng Chéng de sìhéyuàn shì Zhōngguó chuántǒng jiànzhù zhōng de jiéchū diǎnxíng。
The compound with houses around a courtyard in Beijing is a typical example of Chinese traditional architecture.
我们家四周围都是高大的建筑，挡住了阳光。
Wǒmen jiā sìzhōuwéi dōushì gāodà de jiànzhù，dǎngzhù le yángguāng。
All around our house are tall buildings, which block the sunshine.
他用炭笔在纸上勾勒出了一个建筑物的轮廓。
Tā yòng tànbǐ zài zhǐ shàng gōulè chū le yígè jiànzhùwù de lúnkuò。
He sketched the contours of a building with a charcoal pencil.
这座建筑物的贴面是大理石的。
Zhèzuò jiànzhùwù de tiēmiàn shì dàlǐshí de。
The surface of the building is made of marble.
乡里聘请工程队修筑圩堤，保护庄稼。
Xiānglǐ pìnqǐng gōngchéngduì xiūzhù wéidī，bǎohù zhuāngjià。
The county employed a construction brigade to mend the embankment on the low-lying land so as to protect the crops.
必须修筑围堤，坚决防止污水下泄。
Bìxū xiūzhù wéidī,jiānjué fángzhǐ wūshuǐ xiàxiè.
We must build banks to prevent the flood from flowing downward.
这座雄奇的建筑始建于唐代，至今已有一千多年历史了。
Zhèzuò xióngqí de jiànzhù shǐjiànyú Tángdài，zhìjīn yǐyǒu yìqiān duōnián lìshǐ le。
This magnificent and peculiar building was originally built in the Tang Dynasty. It is over one thousand years old.
走近了看，这座哥特式建筑阴惨恐怖。

Approaching nearer, the Gothic building is gloomy and heart-rending.
我军在阵地中修筑了坚固的隐蔽所。
Wǒ jūn zài zhèndì zhōng xiūzhù le jiāngù de yǐnbìsuǒ。
Our troop has bulit a solid covered shelter at our position.
预埋件已经全部安装完毕，可以浇筑混凝土了。

All the components that need to be buried in advance have been installed so we can start pouring concrete.
专家建议他们用珍珠岩改良建筑的结构。

The Great Wall is one of the greatest wonders of the world.

这个工程队在筑路方面有一套行之有效的办法。

This construction team has a set of effective methods for road construction.
建筑工人冬天还在徒手搬运砖瓦。

In winter, the construction workers still carry bricks and tiles with their bare hands.

xiūzhù gōngshì

修筑桥梁
xiūzhù qiáoliánɡ
build bridges
修筑堤坝
xiūzhù dībà
put up dykes

xiūzhù fángyùgōngshì
construct defences (英) {或} defenses (美)

xiūfù yǒu lìshǐ yìyì de jiànzhùwù

Rhetoric may be a dirty word in modern architecture，because it implies waste and irrelevance.
Fúhuá zài xiàndàijiànzhùxué zhōng shì yí gè lìng rén jìhuì de cí，yīnwèi tā yìwèizhe làngfèi hé bù qiēzhǔtí。
浮华在现代建筑学中是一个另人忌讳的词，因为它意味着浪费和不切主题。
He said that architecture is the art of wasting space beautifully.
Tā shuō jiànzhùxué shì yì zhǒng wánměi de zhànyòng kōngjiān de yìshù。
他说建筑学是一种完美地占用空间的艺术。
Architecture and eloquence are mixed arts whose end is sometimes beauty and sometimes use.
Jiànzhùxué hé xióngbiànshù shì zōnghé yìshù，qí mùbiāo yǒushíhòu shì měi，yǒushí shì shíyòng。
建筑学和雄辩术是综合艺术，其目标有时候是美，有时是实用。
This building is ugly, but architecturally interesting.
Zhè dòng lóu kànshàngqù hěn chǒu，dànshì cóng jiànzhùxué jiǎodù láikàn què fēicháng yǒuqùr。
这栋楼看上去很丑，但是从建筑学角度来看却非常有趣儿。
I want to study the basics of design and maintenance of buildings.
我想学习建筑设计与维修方面的基础知识。
This building is aesthetically very pleasing.

这所小学是该市最古老的建筑物之一。

to get by on a small salary
靠微薄的薪水勉强度日
His addiction for alcohol is a draft on his meager income.
嗜酒对他微薄的薪水来说是笔不小的消费。

thin-skinned; shy; sensitive

Nobody is willing to cultivate this infertile land.

Though having only limited skills, he is not worried about getting a job.

This shop features small profits but quick turnover and has many loyal clients.

她和丈夫这些年的争吵无非是薄物细故。

The disputes between her, and her husband over all these years have always been about trivial things.
这类食品中添加了薄荷脑。

The menthol in the toothpaste gives a cooling sensation.
这个老师特别刻薄，总骂学生是蠢物。
Zhège lǎoshī tèbié kèbó，zǒng mà xuésheng shì chǔnwù。
This teacher is so acrid, he always call his students fools.
他是个杠夫，以微薄的收入养活全家。
Tā shì gè gàngfū，yǐ wēibó de shōurù yǎnghuó quánjiā。
He is a professional coffin bearer who raises a family with his limited revenue.
陈世美寡情薄义的行为受到了世人的责骂。
Chén Shìměi guǎqíng bóyì de xíngwéi shòudào le shìrén de zémà。
The heartless behavior of Chenshimei was criticized by the public.
行院中的女子多薄情寡义，但也有例外，像杜十娘。
Hòngyuàn zhōng de nǚzǐ duō bóqíng guǎyì，dàn yě yǒu lìwài，xiàng Dù Shíniáng。
Though many prostitutes are faithless and heartless, Du Shiniang is one exception.
他知识浅薄，不能理解呼呼哱是什么意思。
Tā zhīshi qiǎnbó，bùnéng lǐjiě hūhūbō shì shénme yìsi。
He has very limited knowledge. He can\'t understand what hoopoo means.
他说话很刻薄，动不动就讥刺人家，很讨人厌。
Tā shuōhuà hěnkèbó，dòngbudòng jiù jīcì rénjia，hěntǎorényàn。
He is a harsh speaker, often jeering at others. He\'s a nuisance!
站在山顶，看着面前瘠薄的山地，他满脸愁容。
Zhànzài shāndǐng，kàn zhe miànqián jíbó de shāndì，tā mǎnliǎn chóuróng。
Standing on the top of the hill and looking at the sterile land before him, he looked very sad.
我到底不是科班出身，眼睛挤咕半天，也没有喷薄而出的泪水来应景。
Wǒ dàodǐ búshì kēbān chūshēn，yǎnjīng jǐgū bàntiān，yě méiyǒu pēnbó érchū de lèishuǐ lái yìngjǐng。
After all, I didn\'t major in acting. No tears came out of my eyes in spite of the fact that I blinked for so long.
看上去他很有钱，其实家资微薄。
Kànshàngqù tā hěnyǒu qián，qíshí jiāzī wēibó。
He seems to be rich, but in fact he has little wealth.
从事建筑业的工人收入微薄。
Cóngshì jiànzhùyè de gōngrén shōurù wēibó。
Ordinary workers in the building industry earn meager salaries.
他总说自己脸薄，但做起事来从来是不知羞耻。
Tā zǒng shuō zìjǐ liǎnbáo，dàn zuòqǐshìlái cónglái shì bùzhī xiūchǐ。
He always says he is thin-skinned, but he always acts without knowing shame.
我聊备一点薄礼，不成敬意，还请您笑纳。
Wǒ liáobèi yìdiǎn bólǐ，bùchéng jìngyì，hái qǐng nín xiàonà。
I have just prepared a little gift to show my homage. Please take it.
我现在只有微薄的收入和寮房一间。
Wǒ xiànzài zhǐyǒu wēibó de shōurù hé liáofáng yì jiān。
Now I only have a slender income, and a simple living room.
我最近如临深履薄，惴惴不安。
Wǒ zuìjìn rú línshēn lǚbó，zhuìzhuì bùān。
Recently I feel that I am on thin ice, I am always anxious and fearful.
天气渐渐暖和了，他换上了一件轻薄的毛衫。
Tiānqì jiànjiàn nuǎnhé le，tā huànshàng le yíjiàn qīngbáo de máoshān。
It is turning warm, so he\'s changing into a thin sweater.
她总觉得自己命薄，赶不上好机会。
Tā zǒng juédé zìjǐ mìngbó，gǎnbúshàng hǎo jīhuì。
She always thinks that she was born unlucky, and could not encounter main chances.
他总是贫嘴薄舌地挖苦人家，人家怎能高兴呢？
Tā zǒngshì pínzuǐ bóshé de wākǔ rénjia，rénjia zěnnéng gāoxìng ne？
He is always annoyingly garrulous and sharp-tongued towards everyone, how could anyone be happy?
这块土地太硗薄，村民们都不愿去耕种。
Zhèkuài tǔdì tài qiāobó，cūnmínmen dōu búyuàn qù gēngzhòng。
The stretch of land is so infertile that no villager is willing to plough it.
陪同皇帝游历的这几天，我一直是如临深渊，如履薄冰，生怕自己做错事。
Péitóng huángdì yóulì de zhè jǐ tiān，wǒ yìzhí shì rúlín shēnyuān，rúlǚbóbīng，shēngpà zìjǐ zuò cuòshì。
Those days when I accompanied the emperor on his tour, I was afraid of doing something wrong, as if I was standing on the edge of an abyss or treading on thin ice.
薄荷具有提神醒脑的作用。
Bòhe jùyǒu tíshén xǐngnǎo de zuòyòng。
Mint can refresh the  mind.
她是一个儇薄女子，很不安分守己的。
Tā shì yígè xuānbó nǚzǐ，hěn bùānfèn shǒujǐ de。
She is a skittish girl who doesn\'t behave herself.
烟气缭绕，远看像是披了一层薄纱。
Yānqì liáorào，yuǎnkàn xiàng shì pī le yì céng báoshā。
The world is covered by mist. It looks as if it\'s wearing a veil.
新娘子的脸被薄纱遮护着，有一种蒙胧美。

我如履薄冰。

他们为了一点微薄的收入而整日工作。

Tā de yīzhuó jì dānbó yòu pùlù。
她的衣着既单薄又曝露。

劝学
quànxué
encourage learning

劝学。

The professor was able to fetch over the opinions of the students.

教授能劝说学生改变他们的想法。
The teacher counsels troubled students.
Lǎoshī quàngào wèntí xuésheng。
老师劝告问题学生。

try to persuade him to recover his conscience and turn from his evil ways
我劝说了半天，他才肯了。
Wǒ quànshuō le bàntiān，tā cái kěn le。
He did not agree until I had talked to him for a long time.
我们已经劝说过他，叫他放弃原来的计划。

We\'ve talked him out of his original plan.
他听从了我的劝说。
Tā tīngcóng le wǒ de quànshuō。
He gave in to my persuasion.
任我们怎样劝说，他也不听。
Rèn wǒmen zěnyàng quànshuō，tā yě bùtīng。
No matter how hard we tried to persuade him, he wouldn\'t listen.
我们好言好语地劝说他，但从来没有效果。

We admonished him, but our intentions were in vain.
经过几番劝说，他的怒气才算是消歇了。
Jīngguò jǐ fān quànshuō，tā de nùqì cái suànshì xiāoxiē le。
He was persuaded to calm down at last.
经过几番劝说，他的怒气才算是销歇了。

His anger finally subsided following other people\'s coaxing.

Though everyone has been trying to persuade him for a long time, Constantine is still very angry.

jílì quànshuō
do one\'s utmost to persuade

竭力告诫；力劝；努力说服某人

据说这家餐馆的食物不好吃，有人已经劝我不要来这吃饭。

极意劝解

tīnɡcónɡ quànɡào

yǔ zhòngxīncháng de quàngào

耐心劝导
nàixīn quàndǎo
try patiently to talk sb. round
经过同志们劝导，他终于想通了。
Jīngguò tóngzhìmen quàndǎo，tā zhōng yú xiǎngtōng le。
With the help of his comrades, he has finally straightened things out in his mind.
经过教练的耐心劝导，她终于抛舍了紧张情绪，赛出了好成绩。

After her coach\'s patient exhortations, her pressure finally eased and she achieved a good result.

Zài jiārén de quàndǎo xià，tā xiǎngtōngle.
Under the persuasive influence of his family, he came round.
厂领导经常虚心听取员工劝谏。

Leaders of the factory have an open mind on employees\' opinions.
劝导
要听从劝导，别在这里胡闹了。
经过再三劝导，他终于改正了错误。
一职工直言劝谏厂领导别搞花架子。
The leader\'s cool persuasion changed his mind.
领导平心静气的劝解让他改变了想法。
他心里不好受，你去劝劝吧。
Tā xīnlǐ bùhǎoshòu，nǐ qù quànquàn ba。
He\'s feeling bad; please go and say a few words to comfort him.
左劝右劝
zuǒ quàn yòu quàn 
try again and again to persuade sb.
我们劝他休息，他怎么也不依。
Wǒmen quàn tā xiūxi，tā zěnme yě bùyī。
We advised him to have a rest, but he simply wouldn\'t hear of it.
奉劝你少喝点儿酒。
Fèngquàn nǐ shǎo hē diǎnr jiǔ。
I\'d like to advise you not to drink too much.
好意规劝
hǎoyì guīquàn
give well-meaning advice
好意相劝
hǎoyì xiāngquàn
give well-intentioned advice
哄劝孩子吃药
hǒngquàn háizi chī yào
coax a child to take medicine
劝说他良心发现，回头是岸。
Quànshuō tā liángxīn fāxiàn，huítóu shì\'àn。
try to persuade him to recover his conscience and turn from his evil ways
极力劝阻
jílì quànzǔ 
try very hard to dissuade sb. from doing sth.
我劝说了半天，他才肯了。
Wǒ quànshuō le bàntiān，tā cái kěn le。
He did not agree until I had talked to him for a long time.
苦劝
kǔ quàn
earnestly advise (or exhort)
苦口相劝
kǔkǒu xiāngquàn
earnestly advise (or exhort)
我几次三番劝他，他还是磨不过来。
Wǒ jǐcìsānfān quàn tā，tā háishi mò bú guòlái。
I had talked to him again and again, but he simply wouldn\'t come round.
听了她的一番劝慰，一股暖流涌上我的心头。
Tīng le tā de yì fān quànwèi，yì gǔ nuǎnliú yǒngshàngwǒ de xīntóu。
Her soothing words left me with a glow in my heart.
我们劝他不要那样做，可他偏偏不听。
Wǒmen quàn tā búyào nàyàngzuò，kě tā piānpiān bùtīng。
We tried to talk him out of it, but he just wouldn\'t listen.
劝其戒烟
quàn qí jièyān
advise him (or her) to give up smoking
我们对待在工作中犯过错误的人采取规劝态度，使之翻然改进，弃旧图新。
Wǒmen duìdài zài gōngzuò zhōng fànguò cuòwù de rén cǎiqǔ guīquàn tàidu，shǐ zhī fānrán gǎijìn，qìjiùtúxīn。
Our attitude towards any person who has made mistakes in his work should be one of persuasion in order to help him change and start afresh.
我劝他别生气，反被他抢白了一顿。
Wǒ quàn tā bié shēngqì，fǎn bèi tā qiǎngbái le yídùn。
I tried to pacify him, but got a rebuff for my pains.
劝他戒烟
quàn tā jièyān
advise him to give up (or quit) smoking
劝他休息
quàn tā xiūxi
urge him to take a rest
我劝了半天，他就是不听。
Wǒ quàn le bàntiān，tā jiùshì bùtīng。
I spent a long time trying to talk him round, but he just wouldn\'t listen.
我们劝他别去了。
Wǒmen quàn tā bié qù le。
We tried to persuade him not to go.
耐心劝导
nàixīn quàndǎo
try patiently to talk sb. round
经过同志们劝导，他终于想通了。
Jīngguò tóngzhìmen quàndǎo，tā zhōng yú xiǎngtōng le。
With the help of his comrades, he has finally straightened things out in his mind.
劝返外地人回乡
quàn fǎn wàidìrén huíxiāng
persuade people from the provinces to return home
我劝告她开车要小心。
Wǒ quàngào tā kāichē yào xiǎoxīn。
I urged her to drive carefully.
医生劝告他注意休息。
Yīshēng quàngào tā zhùyì xiūxi。
The doctor advised him to have a good rest.
她不顾我们的一再劝告。
Tā búgù wǒmen de yízài quàngào。
She disregarded our repeated exhortations.
小王听从了我的劝告，把烟戒了。
Xiǎo Wáng tīngcóng le wǒ de quàngào，bǎ yān jiè le。
Xiao Wang has taken my advice and given up (or quitted) smoking.
大家劝解了半天，她才消气了。
Dàjiā quànjiě le bàntiān，tā cái xiāoqì le。
It was some time before we succeeded in pacifying her.
他们吵架了，你去劝解一下。
Tāmen chǎojià le，nǐ qù quànjiě yíxià。
They\'ve had a quarrel. You try and patch things up between them.
他把我当成亲兄弟一样，时时劝戒我，帮助我。
Tā bǎ wǒ dàngchéng qīnxiōngdì yíyàng，shíshí quànjiè wǒ，bāngzhù wǒ。
He treats me like his own brother and often gives me advice and help.
互相劝勉
hùxiāng quànmiǎn
help and encourage each other
我们已经劝说过他，叫他放弃原来的计划。
Wǒmen yǐjing quànshuō guò tā，jiào tā fàngqì yuánlái de jìhuà。
We\'ve talked him out of his original plan.
他听从了我的劝说。
Tā tīngcóng le wǒ de quànshuō。
He gave in to my persuasion.
你最好劝阻他别那样干。
Nǐ zuìhǎo quànzǔ tā bié nàyàng gàn。
You\'d better try to talk him out of doing that.
看到损害群众利益的行为，我们就要进行劝阻。
Kàndào sǔnhài qúnzhòng lìyì de xíngwéi，wǒmen jiùyào jìnxíng quànzǔ。
Whenever we see a person doing something antisocial, we should try to stop him.
任我们怎样劝说，他也不听。
Rèn wǒmen zěnyàng quànshuō，tā yě bùtīng。
No matter how hard we tried to persuade him, he wouldn\'t listen.
我劝他别去，他不听。
Wǒ quàn tā bié qù，tā bùtīng。
I advised him not to go, but he wouldn\'t listen.
听从劝告
tīnɡcónɡ quànɡào 
accept sb.\'s advice
婉言相劝
wǎnyánxiāngquàn 
gently persuade; plead tactfully
尽管我好言相劝，她依然执意不从。
Jǐnguǎn wǒ hǎoyán xiāngquàn，tā yīrán zhíyì bùcóng。
Though I tried hard to persuade her to do it, she flatly refused.
我怎么劝，他还是不依。
Wǒ zěnme quàn，tā háishi bùyī。
No matter what I said, he just wouldn\'t listen.
永远记住我的劝告。
Yǒngyuǎn jìzhù wǒ de quàngào。
Always remember my advice.
我说这话的用意，只是想劝告他一下。
Wǒ shuō zhè huà de yòngyì，zhǐshì xiǎngquàngào tā yíxià。
I said all that just to give him some advice.
语重心长的劝告
yǔ zhòngxīncháng de quàngào 
earnest advice
你再劝他也没有用。
Nǐ zài quàn tā yě méiyǒu yòng。
No matter how hard you try, you can never persuade him.
你去劝他是找不自在。
Nǐ qù quàn tā shì zhǎo bú zìzài。 
You are borrowing trouble if you try to persuade him.
我多次劝告，他都置若罔闻。
Wǒ duō cì quàngào，tā dōu zhìruòwǎngwén。
I cautioned him many times but he paid no heed.
他是为你着想才劝你不要去的。
Tā shì wèi nǐ zhuóxiǎngcái quàn nǐ búyào qù de。
It was for your good that he advised you not to go.
规劝
guīquàn
admonish; advise
劝学
quànxué
encourage learning
妈妈苦苦哀劝他不要再吸毒了，但没有效果。
Māmā kǔkǔ āiquàn tā búyào zài xīdú le，dàn méiyǒu xiàoguǒ。
Mother said everything she could trying to talk him into quitting drugs, but it was no good.
别把我的劝告当作耳边风。
Bié bǎ wǒ de quàngào dàngzuò ěrbiānfēng。
Don\'t neglect my advice.
他本是去劝解她的，没想到竟遭到了毒骂。
Tā běn shì qù quànjiě tā de，méi xiǎng dào jìng zāodào le dúmà。
He had wanted to persuade her, but was cursed by her instead.
小明坚信没有什么仙家法旨，并劝奶奶也不要相信。
Xiǎo Míng jiānxìn méiyǒu shénme xiānjiā fǎzhǐ，bìng quàn nǎinai yě búyào xiāngxìn。
Xiao Ming doesn’t believe in the power of Buddha and tries to dissuade his grandma from that belief.
他年轻气盛，年长一些的朋友都劝他不要锋铓太露。
Tā niánqīng qìshèng，niánzhǎng yìxiē de péngyou dōu quàn tā búyào fēngmáng tài lòu。
He is too young, and his older friends advise him not to show off his talents.
他患鬼剃头，我们总劝他去治疗，他不听。
Tā huàn guǐtìtóu，wǒmen zǒng quàn tā qù zhìliáo，tā bùtīng。
He has alopecia. We suggested that he receive many treatments, but he did not take our advice.
我们好言相劝你偏不听，出什么差错你自己负责。
Wǒmen hǎoyán xiāngquàn nǐ piān bùtīng，chū shénme chācuò nǐ zìjǐ fùzé。
You will be responsible for any problem, because you do not listen to our well-intentioned words.
我们好言好语地劝说他，但从来没有效果。
Wǒmen hǎoyán hǎoyǔ de quànshuō tā，dàn cónglái méiyǒu xiàoguǒ。
We admonished him, but our intentions were in vain.
她失恋了，我正在对她进行解劝。
Tā shīliàn le，wǒ zhèngzài duì tā jìnxíng jiěquàn。
She has been jilted and I am trying to console her.
经过教练的耐心劝导，她终于抛舍了紧张情绪，赛出了好成绩。
Jīngguò jiàoliàn de nàixīn quàndǎo，tā zhōng yú pāoshě le jǐnzhāng qíngxù，sàichū le hǎo chéngjì。
After her coach\'s patient exhortations, her pressure finally eased and she achieved a good result.
同学聚会时，我们就不要劝杯了。
Tóngxué jùhuì shí，wǒmen jiù búyào quànbēi le。
Don\'t urge others to drink when class members get together.
厂领导经常虚心听取员工劝谏。
Chǎnglǐngdǎo jīngcháng xūxīn tīngqǔ yuángōng quànjiàn。
Leaders of the factory have an open mind on employees\' opinions.
孩子淘气，不听劝教，家长应该多些耐心。
Háizi táoqì，bùtīng quànjiào，jiāzhǎng yīnggāi duō xiē nàixīn。
The kid is naughty and refuses to accept instructions, his parents should be more patient.
我们要认真总结事故原因，以劝诫世人。
Wǒmen yào rènzhēn zǒngjié shìgù yuányīn，yǐ quànjiè shìrén。
We should carefully sum up the cause of the accident to tell people around the world.
文武官员再三劝进，曹操就是不肯称帝。
Wénwǔ guānyuán zàisān quànjìn，Cáo Cāo jiùshì bùkěn chēngdì。
Civil and military officials urged Cao Cao to ascend the throne again and again, but he refused every time.
如果不是主人一再劝让，他还不好意思动筷吃菜呢。
Rúguǒ búshì zhǔrén yízài quàn ràng，tā hái bùhǎoyìsī dòng kuài chī cài ne。
If the host hadn\'t persuaded him again and again, he would have been too embarrassed to eat.
教育孩子应该多劝谕，少责骂。
Jiàoyù háizi yīnggāi duō quànyù，shǎo zémà。
To educate a child, we\'d better reason more and scold less.
由于准备工作不充分，她婉劝哥哥放弃登山。
Yóuyú zhǔnbèi gōngzuò bùchōngfèn，tā wǎnquàn gēge fàngqì dēngshān。
She patiently persuaded her brother to give up mountaineering, because he didn\'t do enough preparation work.
现在正在严打，我劝你还是早日务正吧！
Xiànzài zhèngzài yándǎ，wǒ quàn nǐ háishi zǎorì wùzhèng ba！
A relentless campaign to crack down on criminal activities is being carried out, therefore you\'d better do honest work from now on.
经过姐姐一夜的好言相劝，她终于想开了。
Jīngguò jiějie yí yè de hǎoyán xiāngquàn，tā zhōng yú xiǎngkāi le。
She finally let it go after a whole night of persuasion from her sister.
虽然老师劝过他无数次，他对网络游戏的热衷却丝毫未消减。
Suīrán lǎoshī quàn guò tā wúshù cì，tā duì wǎngluò yóuxì de rè zhōng què sīháo wèi xiāojiǎn。
Though criticized by the teacher many times, he is still obsessed with internet games.
经过几番劝说，他的怒气才算是消歇了。
Jīngguò jǐ fān quànshuō，tā de nùqì cái suànshì xiāoxiē le。
He was persuaded to calm down at last.
经过几番劝说，他的怒气才算是销歇了。
Jīngguò jǐ fān quànshuō，tā de nùqì cái suànshì xiāoxiē le。
His anger finally subsided following other people\'s coaxing.
虽然大家劝说了很久，康斯坦丁依然余怒难消。
Suīrán dàjiā quànshuō le hěn jiǔ，Kāngsītǎndīng yīrán yúnù nánxiāo。
Though everyone has been trying to persuade him for a long time, Constantine is still very angry.
他难劝说得不得了。
Tā nánquànshuōde bùdéliǎo。
It is incredibly difficult to persuade him.

劝告
I managed to talk him out of doing it.
我试图劝他不要那么做。
That\'s just it, you never listen!
你就是这样，总是不听劝告！

我努力劝他留下来，但是没有成功。

我正试着劝说凯伦和我一起出去。

take my advice
[inf] 听我的劝告
to advise sb against sth/doing sth
劝某人不要接受某事/做某事
to counsel sb to do sth
[frm] 劝告某人做某事
Try to persuade her to eat a little.
试着劝她吃点东西。
Umpteen times I gave up when people turned a deaf ear to their wrongs.
许多次我心灰意冷因人们屡劝不听。

领导平心静气的劝解让他改变了想法。

他拒绝听从我的劝告。

我认为劝主教不要轻视哈定先生的权利，是我应尽的职责。
A film producer has tried to persuade  her back to the screen.
Yí wèi diànyǐngzhìpiàn rén yǐ shìtú quàn tā chóngfǎn yínmù。
一位电影制片人已试图劝她重返银幕。
He cursed his friend under his breath for even convincing him to go.
Tā shènzhì wèile tā de péngyou quàn tā zǒu，jiù dīshēng zhòumà biérén。
他甚至为了他的朋友劝他走，就低声咒骂别人。
I sold him the idea to change the company name.

我劝说他改变公司的名称。

Tā de xiōngdi gěi tā xiě xìn， shìtú quàn tā gǎibiàn zhǔyi。
他的兄弟给他写信，试图劝他改变主意。
The professor was able to fetch over the opinions of the students.

教授能劝说学生改变他们的想法。
Quite often they persuade them to give up the hostages.

他们往往会劝说他们交出人质。
Steven had been persuaded into taking meds.
Shǐdìfēn yǐ bèi quànfú chīyào le。
史蒂芬已被劝服吃药了。

你可以劝说一些朋友和同事参加募捐活动吗？
I could not persuade him out of a suspicion that it had been stolen.

我无法劝说他不要再去猜测它是否被偷走了。
I could reason myself into sufficient courage to sit up and look out into the distance.
Wǒ néng quànfú zìjǐ yōngyǒu zúgòu de yǒngqì zuò qǐlái，wàng xiàng yuǎnfāng。
我能劝服自己拥有足够的勇气坐起来，望向远方。
He talked me out of having a secretary.
Tā quàn wǒ qǔxiāole qǐng mìshū de niàntou。
他劝我取消了请秘书的念头。
He used all his conversational weapons.
Tā yòngjìnle zìjǐ de quànshuō jìqiǎo。
他用尽了自己的劝说技巧。
The teacher counsels troubled students.
Lǎoshī quàngào wèntí xuésheng。

You can\'t persuade me to buy this ugly vase!
Nǐ bù kěnéng quànshuō wǒ mǎixià zhème nánkàn de huāpíng。
你不可能劝说我买下这么难看的花瓶。

Māma zhèngzhòng de quàngào zìjǐ de háizi。

The besiegers used starvation to induce surrender.

John\'s succinct turn of phrase persuaded her that it would not be a good idea.
Yuēhàn jiǎnjié de biǎodá fāngshì quànfúle tā xiāngxìn nà búshì yígè hǎo zhǔyi。
约翰简洁的表达方式劝服了她相信那不是一个好主意。
She tried unsuccessfully to persuade him to buy a new car.

她努力劝他买辆新车，但却没有成功。
His final word of advice was not to play with matches.
Tā de zuìhòu quàngào shì búyào wán huǒchái。
他的最后劝告是不要玩火柴。
她失恋了，我正在对她进行解劝。
Tā shīliàn le，wǒ zhèngzài duì tā jìnxíng jiěquàn。

大家劝解了半天，她才消气了。

It was some time before we succeeded in pacifying her.

He had wanted to persuade her, but was cursed by her instead.
经他人劝解，他终于想通了。

With others\' reassurance, he finally came round.
她生气了，你去解劝解劝。

从中劝解。

好意规劝
hǎoyì guīquàn
give well-meaning advice

当局表明已获悉此事。

悉心培育下，梨树一般能长到30英尺高。

悉尼歌剧院的建筑风格真是太了不起了！

这项议案悉数通过。
to know sth backwards {or} &gt; backward and forward
[US] 极熟悉某事
to be familiar with
[+subject] 对…熟悉
to get the feel of sth
开始熟悉某事
having lived abroad for years, I wasn\'t familiar with...
已在国外呆了多年，我都对…不熟悉了

我立即感到自在，因为我见到熟悉的面孔。
He didn\'t know London very well.
他不怎么熟悉伦敦。
to learn of sth
获悉某事
to learn that...
获悉…
this concept is new to me
我对这个概念不熟悉
I\'m new to this way of doing things
我不熟悉这种做事方式
to be a novice at sth
对某物不熟悉
to understand that...
获悉…
to be unfamiliar to sb
对某人来说不熟悉
to be unfamiliar with sth

我们在悉尼遇到的那个男子

我要经由新加坡飞往悉尼。

shúxī dìlǐ mínqíng 
be familiar with the place and its people
你地头熟悉，联系起来方便。
Nǐ dìtóu shúxi，liánxì qǐlái fāngbiàn。
You know the place well, so you can easily make contacts there.
用群众所熟悉和懂得的词句
yòng qúnzhòng suǒ shúxī hé dǒngdé de cíjù
use words which are familiar and intelligible to the masses
这项工作我刚接手，还不熟悉。

I\'m new to the job; in fact, I\'ve just taken over.

Tā shúxī zhè yídài de lùtú。
He knows the roads in this district quite well.
他对这工作不熟悉。
Tā duì zhè gōngzuò bùshúxī。
He is new to the task.
熟悉内情
shúxī nèiqíng
know the ins and outs of the matter; know the inside story of; be in the know
我和他在一起工作过两三年，这就是我所以对他比较熟悉的原因。

He and I have worked together for a couple of years. That\'s why I know him pretty well.

Tā shúxī zhèzuò chéngshì de zhǎnggù。
He knows a lot of historical anecdotes about this city.
熟悉
shúxī
know sth. or sb. well; be familiar with; have an intimate knowledge of
我对上海不熟悉，最好能有当地人伴游。
Wǒ duì Shànghǎi bùshúxī，zuìhǎo néng yǒu dāngdì rén bànyóu。
I\'m not familiar with Shanghai, so I hope that I can travel with a local.

我们只是过路人，对这儿不熟悉。
Wǒmen zhǐshì guòlù rén，duì zhèr bùshúxī。
We are passers-by, and are not familiar with this place.
我们是两姨亲，又是同龄人，所以彼此很熟悉。
Wǒmen shì liǎngyíqīn，yòushì tónglíngrén，suǒyǐ bǐcǐ hěnshúxī。
We are cousins and of the same age, so we are quite familiar with each other.

Tā kànjiàn yǒu yígè shúxī miànyǐng zhèng cóng hēi\'àn zhōng xiàng tā zǒulái。
He saw a familiar shadow walking towards him in the darkness.

惊悉某人不幸逝世
jīnɡ xī mǒu rén búxìnɡ shìshì

获悉
huòxī
learn of an event
日前获悉兄已回国。
据悉，他的论文在评比中获一等奖。
She\'s dying to learn the secret.
她极想获悉秘密。
told for the fifth time
第五次获悉
upset by bad news
因获悉坏消息而心烦意乱
The authority expressed their knowledge of the affair.
当局表明已获悉此事。
to learn of sth
获悉某事
